36 // static
37 Component* Component::ReadNew(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
38  std::string token;
39  ReadToken(is, binary, &token); // e.g. "<SigmoidComponent>".
40  token.erase(0, 1); // erase "<".
41  token.erase(token.length()-1); // erase ">".
42  Component *ans = NewComponentOfType(token);
43  if (!ans)
44  KALDI_ERR << "Unknown component type " << token;
45  ans->Read(is, binary);
46  return ans;
47 }

50 // static
51 Component* Component::NewComponentOfType(const std::string &component_type) {
52  Component *ans = NULL;
53  if (component_type == "SigmoidComponent") {
54  ans = new SigmoidComponent();
55  } else if (component_type == "TanhComponent") {
56  ans = new TanhComponent();
57  } else if (component_type == "PowerComponent") {
58  ans = new PowerComponent();
59  } else if (component_type == "SoftmaxComponent") {
60  ans = new SoftmaxComponent();
61  } else if (component_type == "LogSoftmaxComponent") {
62  ans = new LogSoftmaxComponent();
63  } else if (component_type == "RectifiedLinearComponent") {
64  ans = new RectifiedLinearComponent();
65  } else if (component_type == "NormalizeComponent") {
66  ans = new NormalizeComponent();
67  } else if (component_type == "SoftHingeComponent") {
68  ans = new SoftHingeComponent();
69  } else if (component_type == "PnormComponent") {
70  ans = new PnormComponent();
71  } else if (component_type == "MaxoutComponent") {
72  ans = new MaxoutComponent();
73  } else if (component_type == "ScaleComponent") {
74  ans = new ScaleComponent();
75  } else if (component_type == "AffineComponent") {
76  ans = new AffineComponent();
77  } else if (component_type == "AffineComponentPreconditioned") {
78  ans = new AffineComponentPreconditioned();
79  } else if (component_type == "AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline") {
80  ans = new AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline();
81  } else if (component_type == "SumGroupComponent") {
82  ans = new SumGroupComponent();
83  } else if (component_type == "BlockAffineComponent") {
84  ans = new BlockAffineComponent();
85  } else if (component_type == "BlockAffineComponentPreconditioned") {
86  ans = new BlockAffineComponentPreconditioned();
87  } else if (component_type == "PermuteComponent") {
88  ans = new PermuteComponent();
89  } else if (component_type == "DctComponent") {
90  ans = new DctComponent();
91  } else if (component_type == "FixedLinearComponent") {
92  ans = new FixedLinearComponent();
93  } else if (component_type == "FixedAffineComponent") {
94  ans = new FixedAffineComponent();
95  } else if (component_type == "FixedScaleComponent") {
96  ans = new FixedScaleComponent();
97  } else if (component_type == "FixedBiasComponent") {
98  ans = new FixedBiasComponent();
99  } else if (component_type == "SpliceComponent") {
100  ans = new SpliceComponent();
101  } else if (component_type == "SpliceMaxComponent") {
102  ans = new SpliceMaxComponent();
103  } else if (component_type == "DropoutComponent") {
104  ans = new DropoutComponent();
105  } else if (component_type == "AdditiveNoiseComponent") {
106  ans = new AdditiveNoiseComponent();
107  } else if (component_type == "Convolutional1dComponent") {
108  ans = new Convolutional1dComponent();
109  } else if (component_type == "MaxpoolingComponent") {
110  ans = new MaxpoolingComponent();
111  }
112  return ans;
113 }

115 // static
116 Component* Component::NewFromString(const std::string &initializer_line) {
117  std::istringstream istr(initializer_line);
118  std::string component_type; // e.g. "SigmoidComponent".
119  istr >> component_type >> std::ws;
120  std::string rest_of_line;
121  getline(istr, rest_of_line);
122  Component *ans = NewComponentOfType(component_type);
123  if (ans == NULL)
124  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer line (no such type of Component): "
125  << initializer_line;
126  ans->InitFromString(rest_of_line);
127  return ans;
128 }

131 // This is like ExpectToken but for two tokens, and it
132 // will either accept token1 and then token2, or just token2.
133 // This is useful in Read functions where the first token
134 // may already have been consumed.
135 static void ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(std::istream &is, bool binary,
136  const std::string &token1,
137  const std::string &token2) {
138  KALDI_ASSERT(token1 != token2);
139  std::string temp;
140  ReadToken(is, binary, &temp);
141  if (temp == token1) {
142  ExpectToken(is, binary, token2);
143  } else {
144  if (temp != token2) {
145  KALDI_ERR << "Expecting token " << token1 << " or " << token2
146  << " but got " << temp;
147  }
148  }
149 }

152 // static
153 bool ParseFromString(const std::string &name, std::string *string,
154  int32 *param) {
155  std::vector<std::string> split_string;
156  SplitStringToVector(*string, " \t", true,
157  &split_string);
158  std::string name_equals = name + "="; // the name and then the equals sign.
159  size_t len = name_equals.length();
160 
161  for (size_t i = 0; i < split_string.size(); i++) {
162  if (split_string[i].compare(0, len, name_equals) == 0) {
163  if (!ConvertStringToInteger(split_string[i].substr(len), param))
164  KALDI_ERR << "Bad option " << split_string[i];
165  *string = "";
166  // Set "string" to all the pieces but the one we used.
167  for (size_t j = 0; j < split_string.size(); j++) {
168  if (j != i) {
169  if (!string->empty()) *string += " ";
170  *string += split_string[j];
171  }
172  }
173  return true;
174  }
175  }
176  return false;
177 }

179 bool ParseFromString(const std::string &name, std::string *string,
180  bool *param) {
181  std::vector<std::string> split_string;
182  SplitStringToVector(*string, " \t", true,
183  &split_string);
184  std::string name_equals = name + "="; // the name and then the equals sign.
185  size_t len = name_equals.length();
186 
187  for (size_t i = 0; i < split_string.size(); i++) {
188  if (split_string[i].compare(0, len, name_equals) == 0) {
189  std::string b = split_string[i].substr(len);
190  if (b.empty())
191  KALDI_ERR << "Bad option " << split_string[i];
192  if (b[0] == 'f' || b[0] == 'F') *param = false;
193  else if (b[0] == 't' || b[0] == 'T') *param = true;
194  else
195  KALDI_ERR << "Bad option " << split_string[i];
196  *string = "";
197  // Set "string" to all the pieces but the one we used.
198  for (size_t j = 0; j < split_string.size(); j++) {
199  if (j != i) {
200  if (!string->empty()) *string += " ";
201  *string += split_string[j];
202  }
203  }
204  return true;
205  }
206  }
207  return false;
208 }

236 bool ParseFromString(const std::string &name, std::string *string,
237  std::string *param) {
238  std::vector<std::string> split_string;
239  SplitStringToVector(*string, " \t", true,
240  &split_string);
241  std::string name_equals = name + "="; // the name and then the equals sign.
242  size_t len = name_equals.length();
243 
244  for (size_t i = 0; i < split_string.size(); i++) {
245  if (split_string[i].compare(0, len, name_equals) == 0) {
246  *param = split_string[i].substr(len);
247 
248  // Set "string" to all the pieces but the one we used.
249  *string = "";
250  for (size_t j = 0; j < split_string.size(); j++) {
251  if (j != i) {
252  if (!string->empty()) *string += " ";
253  *string += split_string[j];
254  }
255  }
256  return true;
257  }
258  }
259  return false;

262 bool ParseFromString(const std::string &name, std::string *string,
263  std::vector<int32> *param) {
264  std::vector<std::string> split_string;
265  SplitStringToVector(*string, " \t", true,
266  &split_string);
267  std::string name_equals = name + "="; // the name and then the equals sign.
268  size_t len = name_equals.length();
269 
270  for (size_t i = 0; i < split_string.size(); i++) {
271  if (split_string[i].compare(0, len, name_equals) == 0) {
272  if (!SplitStringToIntegers(split_string[i].substr(len), ":",
273  false, param))
274  KALDI_ERR << "Bad option " << split_string[i];
275  *string = "";
276  // Set "string" to all the pieces but the one we used.
277  for (size_t j = 0; j < split_string.size(); j++) {
278  if (j != i) {
279  if (!string->empty()) *string += " ";
280  *string += split_string[j];
281  }
282  }
283  return true;
284  }
285  }
286  return false;
287 }

290 Component *PermuteComponent::Copy() const {
291  PermuteComponent *ans = new PermuteComponent();
292  ans->reorder_ = reorder_;
293  return ans;

295 void PermuteComponent::Init(const std::vector<int32> &reorder) {
296  reorder_ = reorder;
297  KALDI_ASSERT(!reorder.empty());
298  std::vector<int32> indexes(reorder);
299  std::sort(indexes.begin(), indexes.end());
300  for (int32 i = 0; i < static_cast<int32>(indexes.size()); i++)
301  KALDI_ASSERT(i == indexes[i] && "Not a permutation");
302 }

321 void NonlinearComponent::SetDim(int32 dim) {
322  KALDI_ASSERT(dim > 0);
323  dim_ = dim;
324  value_sum_.Resize(dim);
325  deriv_sum_.Resize(dim);
326  count_ = 0.0;
327 }
328 
329 void NonlinearComponent::UpdateStats(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
330  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *deriv) {
331  KALDI_ASSERT(out_value.NumCols() == InputDim());
332  // Check we have the correct dimensions.
333  if (value_sum_.Dim() != InputDim() ||
334  (deriv != NULL && deriv_sum_.Dim() != InputDim())) {
335  mutex_.Lock();
336  if (value_sum_.Dim() != InputDim()) {
337  value_sum_.Resize(InputDim());
338  count_ = 0.0;
339  }
340  if (deriv != NULL && deriv_sum_.Dim() != InputDim()) {
341  deriv_sum_.Resize(InputDim());
342  count_ = 0.0;
343  value_sum_.SetZero();
344  }
345  mutex_.Unlock();
346  }
347  count_ += out_value.NumRows();
348  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp(InputDim());
349  temp.AddRowSumMat(1.0, out_value, 0.0);
350  value_sum_.AddVec(1.0, temp);
351  if (deriv != NULL) {
352  temp.AddRowSumMat(1.0, *deriv, 0.0);
353  deriv_sum_.AddVec(1.0, temp);
354  }
355 }
356 
357 void NonlinearComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
358  value_sum_.Scale(scale);
359  deriv_sum_.Scale(scale);
360  count_ *= scale;
361 }
362 
363 void NonlinearComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const NonlinearComponent &other) {
364  if (value_sum_.Dim() == 0 && other.value_sum_.Dim() != 0)
365  value_sum_.Resize(other.value_sum_.Dim());
366  if (deriv_sum_.Dim() == 0 && other.deriv_sum_.Dim() != 0)
367  deriv_sum_.Resize(other.deriv_sum_.Dim());
368  if (other.value_sum_.Dim() != 0)
369  value_sum_.AddVec(alpha, other.value_sum_);
370  if (other.deriv_sum_.Dim() != 0)
371  deriv_sum_.AddVec(alpha, other.deriv_sum_);
372  count_ += alpha * other.count_;
373 }
374 
375 void NonlinearComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
376  std::ostringstream ostr_beg, ostr_end;
377  ostr_beg << "<" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "<SigmoidComponent>"
378  ostr_end << "</" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "</SigmoidComponent>"
379  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, ostr_beg.str(), "<Dim>");
380  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &dim_); // Read dimension.
381  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<ValueSum>");
382  value_sum_.Read(is, binary);
383  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<DerivSum>");
384  deriv_sum_.Read(is, binary);
385  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Count>");
386  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &count_);
387  ExpectToken(is, binary, ostr_end.str());
388 }
389 
390 void NonlinearComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
391  std::ostringstream ostr_beg, ostr_end;
392  ostr_beg << "<" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "<SigmoidComponent>"
393  ostr_end << "</" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "</SigmoidComponent>"
394  WriteToken(os, binary, ostr_beg.str());
395  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Dim>");
396  WriteBasicType(os, binary, dim_);
397  WriteToken(os, binary, "<ValueSum>");
398  value_sum_.Write(os, binary);
399  WriteToken(os, binary, "<DerivSum>");
400  deriv_sum_.Write(os, binary);
401  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Count>");
402  WriteBasicType(os, binary, count_);
403  WriteToken(os, binary, ostr_end.str());
404 }

410 void NonlinearComponent::InitFromString(std::string args) {
411  std::string orig_args(args);
412  int32 dim;
413  bool ok = ParseFromString("dim", &args, &dim);
414  if (!ok || !args.empty() || dim <= 0)
415  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
416  << Type() << ": \"" << orig_args << "\"";
417  Init(dim);
418 }

420 void MaxoutComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
421  input_dim_ = input_dim;
422  output_dim_ = output_dim;
423  if (input_dim_ == 0)
424  input_dim_ = 10 * output_dim_; // default group size : 10
425  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ > 0 && output_dim_ >= 0);
426  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ % output_dim_ == 0);
427 }
428 
429 void MaxoutComponent::InitFromString(std::string args) {
430  std::string orig_args(args);
431  int32 input_dim = 0;
432  int32 output_dim = 0;
433  bool ok = ParseFromString("output-dim", &args, &output_dim) &&
434  ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &input_dim);
435  KALDI_LOG << output_dim << " " << input_dim << " " << ok;
436  if (!ok || !args.empty() || output_dim <= 0)
437  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
438  << Type() << ": \"" << orig_args << "\"";
439  Init(input_dim, output_dim);
440 }

443 void MaxoutComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
444  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
445  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
446  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
447  in_info.CheckSize(in);
448  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
449  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
450  out->GroupMax(in);
451 }

453 void MaxoutComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, // in_info,
454  const ChunkInfo &, // out_info,
455  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
456  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
457  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
458  Component *to_update,
459  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
460  in_deriv->Resize(in_value.NumRows(), in_value.NumCols(), kSetZero);
461  in_deriv->GroupMaxDeriv(in_value, out_value);
462  in_deriv->MulRowsGroupMat(out_deriv);
463 }

489 void PnormComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim, BaseFloat p) {
490  input_dim_ = input_dim;
491  output_dim_ = output_dim;
492  if (input_dim_ == 0)
493  input_dim_ = 10 * output_dim_; // default group size : 10
494  p_ = p;
495  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ > 0 && output_dim_ >= 0 && p_ >= 0);
496  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ % output_dim_ == 0);
497 }
498 
499 void PnormComponent::InitFromString(std::string args) {
500  std::string orig_args(args);
501  int32 input_dim = 0;
502  int32 output_dim = 0;
503  BaseFloat p = 2;
504  bool ok = ParseFromString("output-dim", &args, &output_dim) &&
505  ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &input_dim);
506  ParseFromString("p", &args, &p);
507  if (!ok || !args.empty() || output_dim <= 0)
508  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
509  << Type() << ": \"" << orig_args << "\"";
510  Init(input_dim, output_dim, p);
511 }

525 void PnormComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, // in_info,
526  const ChunkInfo &, // out_info,
527  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
528  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
529  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
530  Component *to_update,
531  // may be identical to "this".
532  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
533  in_deriv->Resize(in_value.NumRows(), in_value.NumCols(), kSetZero);
534  in_deriv->GroupPnormDeriv(in_value, out_value, p_);
535  in_deriv->MulRowsGroupMat(out_deriv);
536 }

568 const BaseFloat NormalizeComponent::kNormFloor = pow(2.0, -66);
569 // This component modifies the vector of activations by scaling it so that the
570 // root-mean-square equals 1.0.
571 
572 void NormalizeComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
573  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
574  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
575  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
576  out->CopyFromMat(in);
577 
578  CuVector<BaseFloat> in_norm(in.NumRows());
579  in_norm.AddDiagMat2(1.0 / in.NumCols(),
580  in, kNoTrans, 0.0);
581  in_norm.ApplyFloor(kNormFloor);
582  in_norm.ApplyPow(-0.5);
583  out->MulRowsVec(in_norm);
584 }
585 
586 /*
587  A note on the derivative of NormalizeComponent...
588  let both row_in and row_out be vectors of dimension D.
589  Let p = row_in^T row_in / D, and let
590  f = 1 / sqrt(max(kNormFloor, p)), and we compute row_out as:
591 row_out = f row_in.
592  Suppose we have a quantity deriv_out which is the derivative
593  of the objective function w.r.t. row_out. We want to compute
594  deriv_in which is the derivative of the objective function w.r.t.
595  row_in. Let the objective function be F. One term is obvious: we have
596  deriv_in = f deriv_out + ....
597  next we have to take into account the derivative that gets back-propagated
598  through f. Obviously, dF/df = deriv_out^T row_in.
599  And df/dp = (p <= kNormFloor ? 0.0 : -0.5 p^{-1.5}) = (f == 1 / sqrt(kNormFloor) ? 0.0 : -0.5 f^3),
600  and dp/d(row_in) = 2/D row_in. [it's vector_valued].
601  So this term in dF/d(row_in) equals:
602  dF/df df/dp dp/d(row_in) = 2/D (f == 1 / sqrt(kNormFloor) ? 0.0 : -0.5 f^3) (deriv_out^T row_in) row_in
603  So
604  deriv_in = f deriv_out + (f == 1.0 ? 0.0 : -f^3 / D) (deriv_out^T row_in) row_in
605 
606 */
607 
608 void NormalizeComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, // in_info,
609  const ChunkInfo &, // out_info,
610  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
611  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
612  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
613  Component *to_update,
614  // may be identical to "this".
615  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
616  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), out_deriv.NumCols());
617 
618  CuVector<BaseFloat> in_norm(in_value.NumRows());
619  in_norm.AddDiagMat2(1.0 / in_value.NumCols(),
620  in_value, kNoTrans, 0.0);
621  in_norm.ApplyFloor(kNormFloor);
622  in_norm.ApplyPow(-0.5);
623  in_deriv->AddDiagVecMat(1.0, in_norm, out_deriv, kNoTrans, 0.0);
624  in_norm.ReplaceValue(1.0 / sqrt(kNormFloor), 0.0);
625  in_norm.ApplyPow(3.0);
626  CuVector<BaseFloat> dot_products(in_deriv->NumRows());
627  dot_products.AddDiagMatMat(1.0, out_deriv, kNoTrans, in_value, kTrans, 0.0);
628  dot_products.MulElements(in_norm);
629 
630  in_deriv->AddDiagVecMat(-1.0 / in_value.NumCols(), dot_products, in_value, kNoTrans, 1.0);
631 }
632 
633 void SigmoidComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
634  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
635  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
636  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
637  in_info.CheckSize(in);
638  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
639  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
640 
641  out->Sigmoid(in);
642 }
643 
644 void SigmoidComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, //in_info,
645  const ChunkInfo &, //out_info,
646  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value,
647  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
648  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
649  Component *to_update, // may be identical to "this".
650  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
651  // we ignore in_value and to_update.
652 
653  // The element by element equation would be:
654  // in_deriv = out_deriv * out_value * (1.0 - out_value);
655  // We can accomplish this via calls to the matrix library.
656 
657  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), out_deriv.NumCols());
658  in_deriv->Set(1.0);
659  in_deriv->AddMat(-1.0, out_value);
660  // now in_deriv = 1.0 - out_value [element by element]
661  in_deriv->MulElements(out_value);
662  // now in_deriv = out_value * (1.0 - out_value) [element by element], i.e.
663  // it contains the element-by-element derivative of the nonlinearity.
664  if (to_update != NULL)
665  dynamic_cast<NonlinearComponent*>(to_update)->UpdateStats(out_value,
666  in_deriv);
667  in_deriv->MulElements(out_deriv);
668  // now in_deriv = out_deriv * out_value * (1.0 - out_value) [element by element]
669 }
670 
671 
672 void TanhComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
673  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
674  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
675  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
676  // Apply tanh function to each element of the output...
677  // the tanh function may be written as -1 + ( 2 / (1 + e^{-2 x})),
678  // which is a scaled and shifted sigmoid.
679 
680  in_info.CheckSize(in);
681  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
682  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
683  out->Tanh(in);
684 }
685 
686 void TanhComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, //in_info,
687  const ChunkInfo &, //out_info,
688  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value,
689  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
690  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
691  Component *to_update, // may be identical to "this".
692  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
693  /*
694  Note on the derivative of the tanh function:
695  tanh'(x) = sech^2(x) = -(tanh(x)+1) (tanh(x)-1) = 1 - tanh^2(x)
696 
697  The element by element equation of what we're doing would be:
698  in_deriv = out_deriv * (1.0 - out_value^2).
699  We can accomplish this via calls to the matrix library. */
700 
701  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), out_deriv.NumCols());
702  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_value);
703  in_deriv->ApplyPow(2.0);
704  in_deriv->Scale(-1.0);
705  in_deriv->Add(1.0);
706  // now in_deriv = (1.0 - out_value^2), the element-by-element derivative of
707  // the nonlinearity.
708  if (to_update != NULL)
709  dynamic_cast<NonlinearComponent*>(to_update)->UpdateStats(out_value,
710  in_deriv);
711  in_deriv->MulElements(out_deriv);
712 }

720 void PowerComponent::InitFromString(std::string args) {
721  std::string orig_args(args);
722  int32 dim;
723  BaseFloat power = 2.0;
724  ParseFromString("power", &args, &power); // Optional.
725  // Accept either "dim" or "input-dim" to specify the input dim.
726  // "input-dim" is the canonical one; "dim" simplifies the testing code.
727  bool ok = (ParseFromString("dim", &args, &dim) ||
728  ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &dim));
729  if (!ok || !args.empty() || dim <= 0)
730  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
731  << Type() << ": \"" << orig_args << "\"";
732  Init(dim, power);
733 }

735 void PowerComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
736  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
737  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
738  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
739  in_info.CheckSize(in);
740  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
741  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
742 
743  // Apply power operation to each element of the input...
744  out->CopyFromMat(in);
745  out->ApplyPowAbs(power_);
746 }

748 void PowerComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, //in_info,
749  const ChunkInfo &, //out_info,
750  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
751  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
752  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
753  Component *to_update, // may be identical to "this".
754  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
755  in_deriv->Resize(in_value.NumRows(), in_value.NumCols());
756  // in scalar terms: in_deriv += p * in_value^(p-1) * out_deriv
757  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(in_value);
758  in_deriv->ApplyPowAbs(power_ - 1.0, true);
759  in_deriv->Scale(power_);
760  in_deriv->MulElements(out_deriv);
761 }

791 void RectifiedLinearComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
792  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
793  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
794  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
795  // Apply rectified linear function (x >= 0 ? 1.0 : 0.0)
796  out->CopyFromMat(in);
797  out->ApplyFloor(0.0);
798 }
799 
800 void RectifiedLinearComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, //in_info,
801  const ChunkInfo &, //out_info,
802  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value,
803  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
804  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
805  Component *to_update, // may be identical to "this".
806  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
807 
808  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), out_deriv.NumCols(),
809  kUndefined);
810  in_deriv->CopyFromMat(out_value);
811  in_deriv->ApplyHeaviside();
812  // Now in_deriv(i, j) equals (out_value(i, j) > 0.0 ? 1.0 : 0.0),
813  // which is the derivative of the nonlinearity (well, except at zero
814  // where it's undefined).
815  if (to_update != NULL)
816  dynamic_cast<NonlinearComponent*>(to_update)->UpdateStats(out_value,
817  in_deriv);
818  in_deriv->MulElements(out_deriv);
819 }

821 void SoftHingeComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
822  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
823  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
824  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
825  in_info.CheckSize(in);
826  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
827  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
828  // Apply function x = log(1 + exp(x))
829  out->SoftHinge(in);
830 }
831 
832 void SoftHingeComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, //in_info,
833  const ChunkInfo &, //out_info,
834  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
835  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
836  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
837  Component *to_update, // may be identical to "this".
838  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
839 
840  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), out_deriv.NumCols(),
841  kUndefined);
842  // note: d/dx: log(1 + exp(x)) = (exp(x) / (1 + exp(x)) = 1 / (1 + exp(-x)),
843  // which is the sigmoid function.
844 
845  // if the output is y, then dy/dx = (exp(x) / (1 + exp(x)),
846  // and using y = log(1 + exp(x)) -> exp(x) = exp(y) - 1, we have
847  // dy/dx = (exp(y) - 1) / exp(y)
848 
849 
850  in_deriv->Sigmoid(in_value);
851 
852  if (to_update != NULL)
853  dynamic_cast<NonlinearComponent*>(to_update)->UpdateStats(out_value,
854  in_deriv);
855  in_deriv->MulElements(out_deriv);
856 }

864  out->Scale(scale_);
865 }

922 void SoftmaxComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
923  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
924  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
925  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
926  in_info.CheckSize(in);
927  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
928  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
929 
930  // Apply softmax function to each row of the output...
931  // for that row, we do
932  // x_i = exp(x_i) / sum_j exp(x_j).
933 
934  out->ApplySoftMaxPerRow(in);
935 
936  // This floor on the output helps us deal with
937  // almost-zeros in a way that doesn't lead to overflow.
938  out->ApplyFloor(1.0e-20);
939 }
940 
941 void SoftmaxComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
942  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
943  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value,
944  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
945  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
946  Component *to_update, // only thing updated is counts_.
947  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
948  /*
949  Note on the derivative of the softmax function: let it be
950  p_i = exp(x_i) / sum_i exp_i
951  The [matrix-valued] Jacobian of this function is
952  diag(p) - p p^T
953  Let the derivative vector at the output be e, and at the input be
954  d. We have
955  d = diag(p) e - p (p^T e).
956  d_i = p_i e_i - p_i (p^T e).
957  */
958  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), out_deriv.NumCols());
959  KALDI_ASSERT(SameDim(out_value, out_deriv) && SameDim(out_value, *in_deriv));
960  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &P(out_value), &E(out_deriv);
961  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &D (*in_deriv);
962 
963 
964 #if 1
965  D.CopyFromMat(P);
966  D.MulElements(E);
967  // At this point, D = P .* E (in matlab notation)
968  CuVector<BaseFloat> pe_vec(D.NumRows()); // For each row i, the dot product (p_t . e_t).
969  pe_vec.AddDiagMatMat(1.0, P, kNoTrans, E, kTrans, 0.0);
970 
971  D.AddDiagVecMat(-1.0, pe_vec, P, kNoTrans, 1.0); // does D -= diag(pe_vec) * P.
972 #else
973  // The old code, where we did stuff row-by-row, is as follows;
974  // we had to rework it to use whole-matrix operations in order
975  // to use CUDA more effectively.
976  for (int32 r = 0; r < P.NumRows(); r++) {
977  CuSubVector<BaseFloat> p(P, r), e(E, r), d(D, r);
978  d.AddVecVec(1.0, p, e, 0.0); // d_i = p_i e_i.
979  BaseFloat pT_e = VecVec(p, e); // p^T e.
980  d.AddVec(-pT_e, p); // d_i -= (p^T e) p_i
981  }
982 #endif
983 
984  // The SoftmaxComponent does not have any real trainable parameters, but
985  // during the backprop we store some statistics on the average counts;
986  // these may be used in mixing-up.
987  if (to_update != NULL) {
988  NonlinearComponent *to_update_nonlinear =
989  dynamic_cast<NonlinearComponent*>(to_update);
990  to_update_nonlinear->UpdateStats(out_value);
991  }
992 }
993 
994 void LogSoftmaxComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
995  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
996  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
997  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
998  in_info.CheckSize(in);
999  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
1000  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
1001 
1002  // Applies log softmax function to each row of the output. For each row, we do
1003  // x_i = x_i - log(sum_j exp(x_j))
1004  out->ApplyLogSoftMaxPerRow(in);
1005 
1006  // Just to be consistent with SoftmaxComponent::Propagate()
1007  out->ApplyFloor(Log(1.0e-20));
1008 }
1009 
1010 void LogSoftmaxComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
1011  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
1012  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value,
1013  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
1014  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
1015  Component *to_update,
1016  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
1017  /*
1018  Let the output be y, then
1019  y_i = x_i - log(sum_i exp(x_i))
1020  where x_i is the input to the component. The Jacobian matrix of this
1021  function is
1022  J = I - 1 exp(y^T)
1023  where 1 is a vector of ones. Let the derivative vector at the output be e,
1024  and at the input be d, then we have
1025  d = e - exp(y) Sum(e)
1026  d_i = e_i - exp(y_i) Sum(e)
1027  */
1028  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), out_deriv.NumCols());
1029  KALDI_ASSERT(SameDim(out_value, out_deriv) && SameDim(out_value, *in_deriv));
1030  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &Y(out_value), &E(out_deriv);
1031  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &D (*in_deriv);
1032 
1033  D.CopyFromMat(Y);
1034  D.ApplyExp(); // exp(y)
1035  CuVector<BaseFloat> E_sum(D.NumRows()); // Initializes to zero
1036  E_sum.AddColSumMat(1.0, E); // Sum(e)
1037  D.MulRowsVec(E_sum); // exp(y) Sum(e)
1038  D.Scale(-1.0); // - exp(y) Sum(e)
1039  D.AddMat(1.0, E, kNoTrans); // e - exp(y_i) Sum(e)
1040 
1041  // Updates stats.
1042  if (to_update != NULL) {
1043  NonlinearComponent *to_update_nonlinear =
1044  dynamic_cast<NonlinearComponent*>(to_update);
1045  to_update_nonlinear->UpdateStats(out_value);
1046  }
1047 }

1106 void AffineComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
1107  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_linear_params(linear_params_);
1108  temp_linear_params.SetRandn();
1109  linear_params_.AddMat(stddev, temp_linear_params);
1110 
1111  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_bias_params(bias_params_);
1112  temp_bias_params.SetRandn();
1113  bias_params_.AddVec(stddev, temp_bias_params);
1114 }

1116 std::string AffineComponent::Info() const {
1117  std::stringstream stream;
1118  BaseFloat linear_params_size = static_cast<BaseFloat>(linear_params_.NumRows())
1119  * static_cast<BaseFloat>(linear_params_.NumCols());
1120  BaseFloat linear_stddev =
1121  std::sqrt(TraceMatMat(linear_params_, linear_params_, kTrans) /
1122  linear_params_size),
1123  bias_stddev = std::sqrt(VecVec(bias_params_, bias_params_) /
1124  bias_params_.Dim());
1125  stream << Type() << ", input-dim=" << InputDim()
1126  << ", output-dim=" << OutputDim()
1127  << ", linear-params-stddev=" << linear_stddev
1128  << ", bias-params-stddev=" << bias_stddev
1129  << ", learning-rate=" << LearningRate();
1130  return stream.str();
1131 }
1132 
1133 Component* AffineComponent::Copy() const {
1134  AffineComponent *ans = new AffineComponent();
1135  ans->learning_rate_ = learning_rate_;
1136  ans->linear_params_ = linear_params_;
1137  ans->bias_params_ = bias_params_;
1138  ans->is_gradient_ = is_gradient_;
1139  return ans;
1140 }
1141 
1142 BaseFloat AffineComponent::DotProduct(const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
1143  const AffineComponent *other =
1144  dynamic_cast<const AffineComponent*>(&other_in);
1145  return TraceMatMat(linear_params_, other->linear_params_, kTrans)
1146  + VecVec(bias_params_, other->bias_params_);
1147 }

1149 void AffineComponent::Init(BaseFloat learning_rate,
1150  int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim,
1151  BaseFloat param_stddev, BaseFloat bias_stddev) {
1152  UpdatableComponent::Init(learning_rate);
1153  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
1154  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
1155  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim > 0 && input_dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0);
1156  linear_params_.SetRandn(); // sets to random normally distributed noise.
1157  linear_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
1158  bias_params_.SetRandn();
1159  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
1160 }
1161 
1162 void AffineComponent::Init(BaseFloat learning_rate,
1163  std::string matrix_filename) {
1164  UpdatableComponent::Init(learning_rate);
1165  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
1166  ReadKaldiObject(matrix_filename, &mat); // will abort on failure.
1167  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() >= 2);
1168  int32 input_dim = mat.NumCols() - 1, output_dim = mat.NumRows();
1169  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
1170  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
1171  linear_params_.CopyFromMat(mat.Range(0, output_dim, 0, input_dim));
1172  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, input_dim);
1173 }

1175 void AffineComponent::InitFromString(std::string args) {
1176  std::string orig_args(args);
1177  bool ok = true;
1178  BaseFloat learning_rate = learning_rate_;
1179  std::string matrix_filename;
1180  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
1181  ParseFromString("learning-rate", &args, &learning_rate); // optional.
1182  if (ParseFromString("matrix", &args, &matrix_filename)) {
1183  Init(learning_rate, matrix_filename);
1184  if (ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &input_dim))
1185  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim == InputDim() &&
1186  "input-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
1187  if (ParseFromString("output-dim", &args, &output_dim))
1188  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim == OutputDim() &&
1189  "output-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
1190  } else {
1191  ok = ok && ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &input_dim);
1192  ok = ok && ParseFromString("output-dim", &args, &output_dim);
1193  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(input_dim),
1194  bias_stddev = 1.0;
1195  ParseFromString("param-stddev", &args, &param_stddev);
1196  ParseFromString("bias-stddev", &args, &bias_stddev);
1197  Init(learning_rate, input_dim, output_dim,
1198  param_stddev, bias_stddev);
1199  }
1200  if (!args.empty())
1201  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
1202  << args;
1203  if (!ok)
1204  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << orig_args;
1205 }

1207 
1208 void AffineComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
1209  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
1210  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
1211  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
1212  in_info.CheckSize(in);
1213  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
1214  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
1215 
1216  // No need for asserts as they'll happen within the matrix operations.
1217  out->CopyRowsFromVec(bias_params_); // copies bias_params_ to each row
1218  // of *out.
1219  out->AddMatMat(1.0, in, kNoTrans, linear_params_, kTrans, 1.0);
1220 }
1221 
1222 void AffineComponent::UpdateSimple(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
1223  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
1224  bias_params_.AddRowSumMat(learning_rate_, out_deriv, 1.0);
1225  linear_params_.AddMatMat(learning_rate_, out_deriv, kTrans,
1226  in_value, kNoTrans, 1.0);
1227 }
1228 
1229 void AffineComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, //in_info,
1230  const ChunkInfo &, //out_info,
1231  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
1232  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //out_value,
1233  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
1234  Component *to_update_in, // may be identical to "this".
1235  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
1236  AffineComponent *to_update = dynamic_cast<AffineComponent*>(to_update_in);
1237  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), InputDim());
1238  // Propagate the derivative back to the input.
1239  in_deriv->AddMatMat(1.0, out_deriv, kNoTrans, linear_params_, kNoTrans,
1240  0.0);
1241 
1242  if (to_update != NULL) {
1243  // Next update the model (must do this 2nd so the derivatives we propagate
1244  // are accurate, in case this == to_update_in.)
1245  if (to_update->is_gradient_)
1246  to_update->UpdateSimple(in_value, out_deriv);
1247  else // the call below is to a virtual function that may be re-implemented
1248  to_update->Update(in_value, out_deriv); // by child classes.
1249  }
1250 }
1251 
1252 void AffineComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
1253  std::ostringstream ostr_beg, ostr_end;
1254  ostr_beg << "<" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "<AffineComponent>"
1255  ostr_end << "</" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "</AffineComponent>"
1256  // might not see the "<AffineComponent>" part because
1257  // of how ReadNew() works.
1258  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, ostr_beg.str(), "<LearningRate>");
1259  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &learning_rate_);
1260  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<LinearParams>");
1261  linear_params_.Read(is, binary);
1262  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
1263  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
1264  std::string tok;
1265  // back-compatibility code. TODO: re-do this later.
1266  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
1267  if (tok == "<AvgInput>") { // discard the following.
1268  CuVector<BaseFloat> avg_input;
1269  avg_input.Read(is, binary);
1270  BaseFloat avg_input_count;
1271  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<AvgInputCount>");
1272  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &avg_input_count);
1273  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
1274  }
1275  if (tok == "<IsGradient>") {
1276  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
1277  ExpectToken(is, binary, ostr_end.str());
1278  } else {
1279  is_gradient_ = false;
1280  KALDI_ASSERT(tok == ostr_end.str());
1281  }
1282 }

1284 void AffineComponent::Write(std::ostream &os, bool binary) const {
1285  std::ostringstream ostr_beg, ostr_end;
1286  ostr_beg << "<" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "<AffineComponent>"
1287  ostr_end << "</" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "</AffineComponent>"
1288  WriteToken(os, binary, ostr_beg.str());
1289  WriteToken(os, binary, "<LearningRate>");
1290  WriteBasicType(os, binary, learning_rate_);
1291  WriteToken(os, binary, "<LinearParams>");
1292  linear_params_.Write(os, binary);
1293  WriteToken(os, binary, "<BiasParams>");
1294  bias_params_.Write(os, binary);
1295  WriteToken(os, binary, "<IsGradient>");
1296  WriteBasicType(os, binary, is_gradient_);
1297  WriteToken(os, binary, ostr_end.str());
1298 }

1300 int32 AffineComponent::GetParameterDim() const {
1301  return (InputDim() + 1) * OutputDim();
1302 }
1303 void AffineComponent::Vectorize(VectorBase<BaseFloat> *params) const {
1304  params->Range(0, InputDim() * OutputDim()).CopyRowsFromMat(linear_params_);
1305  params->Range(InputDim() * OutputDim(),
1306  OutputDim()).CopyFromVec(bias_params_);
1307 }
1308 void AffineComponent::UnVectorize(const VectorBase<BaseFloat> &params) {
1309  linear_params_.CopyRowsFromVec(params.Range(0, InputDim() * OutputDim()));
1310  bias_params_.CopyFromVec(params.Range(InputDim() * OutputDim(),
1311  OutputDim()));
1312 }
1313 
1314 void AffineComponent::LimitRank(int32 d,
1315  AffineComponent **a, AffineComponent **b) const {
1316  KALDI_ASSERT(d <= InputDim());
1317 
1318  // We'll limit the rank of just the linear part, keeping the bias vector full.
1319  Matrix<BaseFloat> M (linear_params_);
1320  int32 rows = M.NumRows(), cols = M.NumCols(), rc_min = std::min(rows, cols);
1321  Vector<BaseFloat> s(rc_min);
1322  Matrix<BaseFloat> U(rows, rc_min), Vt(rc_min, cols);
1323  // Do the destructive svd M = U diag(s) V^T. It actually outputs the transpose of V.
1324  M.DestructiveSvd(&s, &U, &Vt);
1325  SortSvd(&s, &U, &Vt); // Sort the singular values from largest to smallest.
1326  BaseFloat old_svd_sum = s.Sum();
1327  U.Resize(rows, d, kCopyData);
1328  s.Resize(d, kCopyData);
1329  Vt.Resize(d, cols, kCopyData);
1330  BaseFloat new_svd_sum = s.Sum();
1331  KALDI_LOG << "Reduced rank from "
1332  << rc_min << " to " << d << ", SVD sum reduced from "
1333  << old_svd_sum << " to " << new_svd_sum;
1334 
1335  // U.MulColsVec(s); // U <-- U diag(s)
1336  Vt.MulRowsVec(s); // Vt <-- diag(s) Vt.
1337 
1338  *a = dynamic_cast<AffineComponent*>(this->Copy());
1339  *b = dynamic_cast<AffineComponent*>(this->Copy());
1340 
1341  (*a)->bias_params_.Resize(d, kSetZero);
1342  (*a)->linear_params_ = Vt;
1343 
1344  (*b)->bias_params_ = this->bias_params_;
1345  (*b)->linear_params_ = U;
1346 }
1347 
1348 Component *AffineComponent::CollapseWithNext(
1349  const AffineComponent &next_component) const {
1350  AffineComponent *ans = dynamic_cast<AffineComponent*>(this->Copy());
1351  KALDI_ASSERT(ans != NULL);
1352  // Note: it's possible that "ans" is really of a derived type such
1353  // as AffineComponentPreconditioned, but this will still work.
1354  // the "copy" call will copy things like learning rates, "alpha" value
1355  // for preconditioned component, etc.
1356  ans->linear_params_.Resize(next_component.OutputDim(), InputDim());
1357  ans->bias_params_ = next_component.bias_params_;
1358 
1359  ans->linear_params_.AddMatMat(1.0, next_component.linear_params_, kNoTrans,
1360  this->linear_params_, kNoTrans, 0.0);
1361  ans->bias_params_.AddMatVec(1.0, next_component.linear_params_, kNoTrans,
1362  this->bias_params_, 1.0);
1363  return ans;
1364 }
1365 
1366 Component *AffineComponent::CollapseWithNext(
1367  const FixedAffineComponent &next_component) const {
1368  // If at least one was non-updatable, make the whole non-updatable.
1369  FixedAffineComponent *ans =
1370  dynamic_cast<FixedAffineComponent*>(next_component.Copy());
1371  KALDI_ASSERT(ans != NULL);
1372  ans->linear_params_.Resize(next_component.OutputDim(), InputDim());
1373  ans->bias_params_ = next_component.bias_params_;
1374 
1375  ans->linear_params_.AddMatMat(1.0, next_component.linear_params_, kNoTrans,
1376  this->linear_params_, kNoTrans, 0.0);
1377  ans->bias_params_.AddMatVec(1.0, next_component.linear_params_, kNoTrans,
1378  this->bias_params_, 1.0);
1379  return ans;
1380 }
1381 
1382 Component *AffineComponent::CollapseWithNext(
1383  const FixedScaleComponent &next_component) const {
1384  KALDI_ASSERT(this->OutputDim() == next_component.InputDim());
1385  AffineComponent *ans =
1386  dynamic_cast<AffineComponent*>(this->Copy());
1387  KALDI_ASSERT(ans != NULL);
1388  ans->linear_params_.MulRowsVec(next_component.scales_);
1389  ans->bias_params_.MulElements(next_component.scales_);
1390 
1391  return ans;
1392 }

1479 void AffineComponentPreconditioned::Init(BaseFloat learning_rate,

1489  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);

1495 void AffineComponentPreconditioned::Init(
1496  BaseFloat learning_rate,
1497  int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim,
1498  BaseFloat param_stddev, BaseFloat bias_stddev,
1499  BaseFloat alpha, BaseFloat max_change) {
1500  UpdatableComponent::Init(learning_rate);
1501  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim > 0 && output_dim > 0);
1502  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
1503  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
1504  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim > 0 && input_dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0);
1505  linear_params_.SetRandn(); // sets to random normally distributed noise.
1506  linear_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
1507  bias_params_.SetRandn();
1508  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
1509  alpha_ = alpha;
1510  KALDI_ASSERT(alpha_ > 0.0);
1511  max_change_ = max_change; // Note: any value of max_change_is valid, but
1512  // only values > 0.0 will actually activate the code.
1513 }

1534 std::string AffineComponentPreconditioned::Info() const {
1535  std::stringstream stream;
1536  BaseFloat linear_params_size = static_cast<BaseFloat>(linear_params_.NumRows())
1537  * static_cast<BaseFloat>(linear_params_.NumCols());
1538  BaseFloat linear_stddev =
1539  std::sqrt(TraceMatMat(linear_params_, linear_params_, kTrans) /
1540  linear_params_size),
1541  bias_stddev = std::sqrt(VecVec(bias_params_, bias_params_) /
1542  bias_params_.Dim());
1543  stream << Type() << ", input-dim=" << InputDim()
1544  << ", output-dim=" << OutputDim()
1545  << ", linear-params-stddev=" << linear_stddev
1546  << ", bias-params-stddev=" << bias_stddev
1547  << ", learning-rate=" << LearningRate()
1548  << ", alpha=" << alpha_
1549  << ", max-change=" << max_change_;
1550  return stream.str();
1551 }

1556  ans->linear_params_ = linear_params_;

1563 
1564 
1565 BaseFloat AffineComponentPreconditioned::GetScalingFactor(
1566  const CuMatrix<BaseFloat> &in_value_precon,
1567  const CuMatrix<BaseFloat> &out_deriv_precon) {
1568  static int scaling_factor_printed = 0;
1569 
1570  KALDI_ASSERT(in_value_precon.NumRows() == out_deriv_precon.NumRows());
1571  CuVector<BaseFloat> in_norm(in_value_precon.NumRows()),
1572  out_deriv_norm(in_value_precon.NumRows());
1573  in_norm.AddDiagMat2(1.0, in_value_precon, kNoTrans, 0.0);
1574  out_deriv_norm.AddDiagMat2(1.0, out_deriv_precon, kNoTrans, 0.0);
1575  // Get the actual l2 norms, not the squared l2 norm.
1576  in_norm.ApplyPow(0.5);
1577  out_deriv_norm.ApplyPow(0.5);
1578  BaseFloat sum = learning_rate_ * VecVec(in_norm, out_deriv_norm);
1579  // sum is the product of norms that we are trying to limit
1580  // to max_value_.
1581  KALDI_ASSERT(sum == sum && sum - sum == 0.0 &&
1582  "NaN in backprop");
1583  KALDI_ASSERT(sum >= 0.0);
1584  if (sum <= max_change_) return 1.0;
1585  else {
1586  BaseFloat ans = max_change_ / sum;
1587  if (scaling_factor_printed < 10) {
1588  KALDI_LOG << "Limiting step size to " << max_change_
1589  << " using scaling factor " << ans << ", for component index "
1590  << Index();
1591  scaling_factor_printed++;
1592  }
1593  return ans;
1594  }
1595 }
1596 
1597 void AffineComponentPreconditioned::Update(
1598  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
1599  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
1600  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_temp;
1601 
1602  in_value_temp.Resize(in_value.NumRows(),
1603  in_value.NumCols() + 1, kUndefined);
1604  in_value_temp.Range(0, in_value.NumRows(),
1605  0, in_value.NumCols()).CopyFromMat(in_value);
1606 
1607  // Add the 1.0 at the end of each row "in_value_temp"
1608  in_value_temp.Range(0, in_value.NumRows(),
1609  in_value.NumCols(), 1).Set(1.0);
1610 
1611  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_precon(in_value_temp.NumRows(),
1612  in_value_temp.NumCols(), kUndefined),
1613  out_deriv_precon(out_deriv.NumRows(),
1614  out_deriv.NumCols(), kUndefined);
1615  // each row of in_value_precon will be that same row of
1616  // in_value, but multiplied by the inverse of a Fisher
1617  // matrix that has been estimated from all the other rows,
1618  // smoothed by some appropriate amount times the identity
1619  // matrix (this amount is proportional to \alpha).
1620  PreconditionDirectionsAlphaRescaled(in_value_temp, alpha_, &in_value_precon);
1621  PreconditionDirectionsAlphaRescaled(out_deriv, alpha_, &out_deriv_precon);
1622 
1623  BaseFloat minibatch_scale = 1.0;
1624 
1625  if (max_change_ > 0.0)
1626  minibatch_scale = GetScalingFactor(in_value_precon, out_deriv_precon);
1627 
1628 
1629  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_precon_part(in_value_precon,
1630  0, in_value_precon.NumRows(),
1631  0, in_value_precon.NumCols() - 1);
1632  // this "precon_ones" is what happens to the vector of 1's representing
1633  // offsets, after multiplication by the preconditioner.
1634  CuVector<BaseFloat> precon_ones(in_value_precon.NumRows());
1635 
1636  precon_ones.CopyColFromMat(in_value_precon, in_value_precon.NumCols() - 1);
1637 
1638  BaseFloat local_lrate = minibatch_scale * learning_rate_;
1639  bias_params_.AddMatVec(local_lrate, out_deriv_precon, kTrans,
1640  precon_ones, 1.0);
1641  linear_params_.AddMatMat(local_lrate, out_deriv_precon, kTrans,
1642  in_value_precon_part, kNoTrans, 1.0);
1643 }
1644 
1645 
1646 // virtual
1647 void AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline::Resize(
1648  int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
1649  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim > 1 && output_dim > 1);
1650  if (rank_in_ >= input_dim) rank_in_ = input_dim - 1;
1651  if (rank_out_ >= output_dim) rank_out_ = output_dim - 1;
1652  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
1653  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
1654  OnlinePreconditioner temp;
1655  preconditioner_in_ = temp;
1656  preconditioner_out_ = temp;
1657  SetPreconditionerConfigs();
1658 }
1659 
1660 
1661 void AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
1662  std::ostringstream ostr_beg, ostr_end;
1663  ostr_beg << "<" << Type() << ">";
1664  ostr_end << "</" << Type() << ">";
1665  // might not see the "<AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline>" part because
1666  // of how ReadNew() works.
1667  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, ostr_beg.str(), "<LearningRate>");
1668  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &learning_rate_);
1669  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<LinearParams>");
1670  linear_params_.Read(is, binary);
1671  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
1672  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
1673  std::string tok;
1674  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
1675  if (tok == "<Rank>") { // back-compatibility (temporary)
1676  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank_in_);
1677  rank_out_ = rank_in_;
1678  } else {
1679  KALDI_ASSERT(tok == "<RankIn>");
1680  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank_in_);
1681  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<RankOut>");
1682  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &rank_out_);
1683  }
1684  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
1685  if (tok == "<UpdatePeriod>") {
1686  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &update_period_);
1687  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<NumSamplesHistory>");
1688  } else {
1689  update_period_ = 1;
1690  KALDI_ASSERT(tok == "<NumSamplesHistory>");
1691  }
1692  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &num_samples_history_);
1693  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<Alpha>");
1694  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &alpha_);
1695  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<MaxChangePerSample>");
1696  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &max_change_per_sample_);
1697  ExpectToken(is, binary, ostr_end.str());
1698  SetPreconditionerConfigs();
1699 }
1700 
1701 void AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline::InitFromString(std::string args) {
1702  std::string orig_args(args);
1703  bool ok = true;
1704  std::string matrix_filename;
1705  BaseFloat learning_rate = learning_rate_;
1706  BaseFloat num_samples_history = 2000.0, alpha = 4.0,
1707  max_change_per_sample = 0.1;
1708  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1, rank_in = 30, rank_out = 80,
1709  update_period = 1;
1710  ParseFromString("learning-rate", &args, &learning_rate); // optional.
1711  ParseFromString("num-samples-history", &args, &num_samples_history);
1712  ParseFromString("alpha", &args, &alpha);
1713  ParseFromString("max-change-per-sample", &args, &max_change_per_sample);
1714  ParseFromString("rank-in", &args, &rank_in);
1715  ParseFromString("rank-out", &args, &rank_out);
1716  ParseFromString("update-period", &args, &update_period);
1717 
1718  if (ParseFromString("matrix", &args, &matrix_filename)) {
1719  Init(learning_rate, rank_in, rank_out, update_period,
1720  num_samples_history, alpha, max_change_per_sample,
1721  matrix_filename);
1722  if (ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &input_dim))
1723  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim == InputDim() &&
1724  "input-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
1725  if (ParseFromString("output-dim", &args, &output_dim))
1726  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim == OutputDim() &&
1727  "output-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
1728  } else {
1729  ok = ok && ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &input_dim);
1730  ok = ok && ParseFromString("output-dim", &args, &output_dim);
1731  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(input_dim),
1732  bias_stddev = 1.0;
1733  ParseFromString("param-stddev", &args, &param_stddev);
1734  ParseFromString("bias-stddev", &args, &bias_stddev);
1735  Init(learning_rate, input_dim, output_dim, param_stddev,
1736  bias_stddev, rank_in, rank_out, update_period,
1737  num_samples_history, alpha, max_change_per_sample);
1738  }
1739  if (!args.empty())
1740  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: "
1741  << args;
1742  if (!ok)
1743  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << orig_args;
1744 }

1746 void AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline::SetPreconditionerConfigs() {
1747  preconditioner_in_.SetRank(rank_in_);
1748  preconditioner_in_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history_);
1749  preconditioner_in_.SetAlpha(alpha_);
1750  preconditioner_in_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period_);
1751  preconditioner_out_.SetRank(rank_out_);
1752  preconditioner_out_.SetNumSamplesHistory(num_samples_history_);
1753  preconditioner_out_.SetAlpha(alpha_);
1754  preconditioner_out_.SetUpdatePeriod(update_period_);
1755 }

1757 void AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline::Init(
1758  BaseFloat learning_rate, int32 rank_in, int32 rank_out,
1759  int32 update_period, BaseFloat num_samples_history, BaseFloat alpha,
1760  BaseFloat max_change_per_sample,
1761  std::string matrix_filename) {
1762  UpdatableComponent::Init(learning_rate);
1763  rank_in_ = rank_in;
1764  rank_out_ = rank_out;
1765  update_period_ = update_period;
1766  num_samples_history_ = num_samples_history;
1767  alpha_ = alpha;
1768  SetPreconditionerConfigs();
1769  KALDI_ASSERT(max_change_per_sample >= 0.0);
1770  max_change_per_sample_ = max_change_per_sample;
1771  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
1772  ReadKaldiObject(matrix_filename, &mat); // will abort on failure.
1773  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() >= 2);
1774  int32 input_dim = mat.NumCols() - 1, output_dim = mat.NumRows();
1775  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
1776  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
1777  linear_params_.CopyFromMat(mat.Range(0, output_dim, 0, input_dim));
1778  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, input_dim);
1779 }

1781 AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline::AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline(
1782  const AffineComponent &orig,
1783  int32 rank_in, int32 rank_out, int32 update_period,
1784  BaseFloat num_samples_history, BaseFloat alpha):
1785  max_change_per_sample_(0.1) {
1786  this->linear_params_ = orig.linear_params_;
1787  this->bias_params_ = orig.bias_params_;
1788  this->learning_rate_ = orig.learning_rate_;
1789  this->is_gradient_ = orig.is_gradient_;
1790  this->rank_in_ = rank_in;
1791  this->rank_out_ = rank_out;
1792  this->update_period_ = update_period;
1793  this->num_samples_history_ = num_samples_history;
1794  this->alpha_ = alpha;
1795  SetPreconditionerConfigs();
1796 }

1798 void AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline::Init(
1799  BaseFloat learning_rate,
1800  int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim,
1801  BaseFloat param_stddev, BaseFloat bias_stddev,
1802  int32 rank_in, int32 rank_out, int32 update_period,
1803  BaseFloat num_samples_history, BaseFloat alpha,
1804  BaseFloat max_change_per_sample) {
1805  UpdatableComponent::Init(learning_rate);
1806  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim);
1807  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
1808  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim > 0 && input_dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0 &&
1809  bias_stddev >= 0.0);
1810  linear_params_.SetRandn(); // sets to random normally distributed noise.
1811  linear_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
1812  bias_params_.SetRandn();
1813  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
1814  rank_in_ = rank_in;
1815  rank_out_ = rank_out;
1816  update_period_ = update_period;
1817  num_samples_history_ = num_samples_history;
1818  alpha_ = alpha;
1819  SetPreconditionerConfigs();
1820  KALDI_ASSERT(max_change_per_sample >= 0.0);
1821  max_change_per_sample_ = max_change_per_sample;
1822 }

1851 std::string AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline::Info() const {
1852  std::stringstream stream;
1853  BaseFloat linear_params_size = static_cast<BaseFloat>(linear_params_.NumRows())
1854  * static_cast<BaseFloat>(linear_params_.NumCols());
1855  BaseFloat linear_stddev =
1856  std::sqrt(TraceMatMat(linear_params_, linear_params_, kTrans) /
1857  linear_params_size),
1858  bias_stddev = std::sqrt(VecVec(bias_params_, bias_params_) /
1859  bias_params_.Dim());
1860  stream << Type() << ", input-dim=" << InputDim()
1861  << ", output-dim=" << OutputDim()
1862  << ", linear-params-stddev=" << linear_stddev
1863  << ", bias-params-stddev=" << bias_stddev
1864  << ", learning-rate=" << LearningRate()
1865  << ", rank-in=" << rank_in_
1866  << ", rank-out=" << rank_out_
1867  << ", num_samples_history=" << num_samples_history_
1868  << ", update_period=" << update_period_
1869  << ", alpha=" << alpha_
1870  << ", max-change-per-sample=" << max_change_per_sample_;
1871  return stream.str();
1872 }

1891 
1892 
1893 
1894 BaseFloat AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline::GetScalingFactor(
1895  const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &in_products,
1896  BaseFloat learning_rate_scale,
1897  CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> *out_products) {
1898  static int scaling_factor_printed = 0;
1899  int32 minibatch_size = in_products.Dim();
1900 
1901  out_products->MulElements(in_products);
1902  out_products->ApplyPow(0.5);
1903  BaseFloat prod_sum = out_products->Sum();
1904  BaseFloat tot_change_norm = learning_rate_scale * learning_rate_ * prod_sum,
1905  max_change_norm = max_change_per_sample_ * minibatch_size;
1906  // tot_change_norm is the product of norms that we are trying to limit
1907  // to max_value_.
1908  KALDI_ASSERT(tot_change_norm - tot_change_norm == 0.0 && "NaN in backprop");
1909  KALDI_ASSERT(tot_change_norm >= 0.0);
1910  if (tot_change_norm <= max_change_norm) return 1.0;
1911  else {
1912  BaseFloat factor = max_change_norm / tot_change_norm;
1913  if (scaling_factor_printed < 10) {
1914  KALDI_LOG << "Limiting step size using scaling factor "
1915  << factor << ", for component index " << Index();
1916  scaling_factor_printed++;
1917  }
1918  return factor;
1919  }
1920 }
1921 
1922 void AffineComponentPreconditionedOnline::Update(
1923  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
1924  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
1925  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_temp;
1926 
1927  in_value_temp.Resize(in_value.NumRows(),
1928  in_value.NumCols() + 1, kUndefined);
1929  in_value_temp.Range(0, in_value.NumRows(),
1930  0, in_value.NumCols()).CopyFromMat(in_value);
1931 
1932  // Add the 1.0 at the end of each row "in_value_temp"
1933  in_value_temp.Range(0, in_value.NumRows(),
1934  in_value.NumCols(), 1).Set(1.0);
1935 
1936  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_temp(out_deriv);
1937 
1938  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> row_products(2,
1939  in_value.NumRows());
1940  CuSubVector<BaseFloat> in_row_products(row_products, 0),
1941  out_row_products(row_products, 1);
1942 
1943  // These "scale" values get will get multiplied into the learning rate (faster
1944  // than having the matrices scaled inside the preconditioning code).
1945  BaseFloat in_scale, out_scale;
1946 
1947  preconditioner_in_.PreconditionDirections(&in_value_temp, &in_row_products,
1948  &in_scale);
1949  preconditioner_out_.PreconditionDirections(&out_deriv_temp, &out_row_products,
1950  &out_scale);
1951 
1952  // "scale" is a scaling factor coming from the PreconditionDirections calls
1953  // (it's faster to have them output a scaling factor than to have them scale
1954  // their outputs).
1955  BaseFloat scale = in_scale * out_scale;
1956  BaseFloat minibatch_scale = 1.0;
1957 
1958  if (max_change_per_sample_ > 0.0)
1959  minibatch_scale = GetScalingFactor(in_row_products, scale,
1960  &out_row_products);
1961 
1962  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_precon_part(in_value_temp,
1963  0, in_value_temp.NumRows(),
1964  0, in_value_temp.NumCols() - 1);
1965  // this "precon_ones" is what happens to the vector of 1's representing
1966  // offsets, after multiplication by the preconditioner.
1967  CuVector<BaseFloat> precon_ones(in_value_temp.NumRows());
1968 
1969  precon_ones.CopyColFromMat(in_value_temp, in_value_temp.NumCols() - 1);
1970 
1971  BaseFloat local_lrate = scale * minibatch_scale * learning_rate_;
1972  bias_params_.AddMatVec(local_lrate, out_deriv_temp, kTrans,
1973  precon_ones, 1.0);
1974  linear_params_.AddMatMat(local_lrate, out_deriv_temp, kTrans,
1975  in_value_precon_part, kNoTrans, 1.0);
1976 }
1977 
1978 void BlockAffineComponent::SetZero(bool treat_as_gradient) {
1979  if (treat_as_gradient) {
1980  SetLearningRate(1.0);
1981  }
1982  linear_params_.SetZero();
1983  bias_params_.SetZero();
1984 }
1985 
1986 void BlockAffineComponent::PerturbParams(BaseFloat stddev) {
1987  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_linear_params(linear_params_);
1988  temp_linear_params.SetRandn();
1989  linear_params_.AddMat(stddev, temp_linear_params);
1990 
1991  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp_bias_params(bias_params_);
1992  temp_bias_params.SetRandn();
1993  bias_params_.AddVec(stddev, temp_bias_params);
1994 }
1995 
1996 BaseFloat BlockAffineComponent::DotProduct(
1997  const UpdatableComponent &other_in) const {
1998  const BlockAffineComponent *other =
1999  dynamic_cast<const BlockAffineComponent*>(&other_in);
2000  return TraceMatMat(linear_params_, other->linear_params_, kTrans)
2001  + VecVec(bias_params_, other->bias_params_);
2002 }

2006  ans->learning_rate_ = learning_rate_;
2007  ans->linear_params_ = linear_params_;
2008  ans->bias_params_ = bias_params_;
2009  ans->num_blocks_ = num_blocks_;
2010  return ans;
2011 }

2013 void BlockAffineComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
2014  linear_params_.Scale(scale);
2015  bias_params_.Scale(scale);
2016 }
2017 
2018 void BlockAffineComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha,
2019  const UpdatableComponent &other_in) {
2020  const BlockAffineComponent *other =
2021  dynamic_cast<const BlockAffineComponent*>(&other_in);
2022  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
2023  linear_params_.AddMat(alpha, other->linear_params_);
2024  bias_params_.AddVec(alpha, other->bias_params_);
2025 }
2026 
2027 void BlockAffineComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
2028  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
2029  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2030  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2031  in_info.CheckSize(in);
2032  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
2033  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
2034 
2035  // The matrix has a block structure where each matrix has input dim
2036  // (#rows) equal to input_block_dim. The blocks are stored in linear_params_
2037  // as [ M
2038  // N
2039  // O ] but we actually treat it as:
2040  // [ M 0 0
2041  // 0 N 0
2042  // 0 0 O ]
2043  int32 input_block_dim = linear_params_.NumCols(),
2044  output_block_dim = linear_params_.NumRows() / num_blocks_,
2045  num_frames = in.NumRows();
2046  KALDI_ASSERT(in.NumCols() == input_block_dim * num_blocks_);
2047  KALDI_ASSERT(out->NumCols() == output_block_dim * num_blocks_);
2048  KALDI_ASSERT(in.NumRows() == out->NumRows());
2049 
2050  out->CopyRowsFromVec(bias_params_); // copies bias_params_ to each row
2051  // of *out.
2052 
2053  for (int32 b = 0; b < num_blocks_; b++) {
2054  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_block(in, 0, num_frames,
2055  b * input_block_dim, input_block_dim),
2056  out_block(*out, 0, num_frames,
2057  b * output_block_dim, output_block_dim),
2058  param_block(linear_params_,
2059  b * output_block_dim, output_block_dim,
2060  0, input_block_dim);
2061  out_block.AddMatMat(1.0, in_block, kNoTrans, param_block, kTrans, 1.0);
2062  }
2063 }
2064 
2065 void BlockAffineComponent::UpdateSimple(
2066  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
2067  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
2068  int32 input_block_dim = linear_params_.NumCols(),
2069  output_block_dim = linear_params_.NumRows() / num_blocks_,
2070  num_frames = in_value.NumRows();
2071 
2072  bias_params_.AddRowSumMat(learning_rate_, out_deriv, 1.0);
2073  for (int32 b = 0; b < num_blocks_; b++) {
2074  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_block(in_value, 0, num_frames,
2075  b * input_block_dim,
2076  input_block_dim),
2077  out_deriv_block(out_deriv, 0, num_frames,
2078  b * output_block_dim, output_block_dim),
2079  param_block(linear_params_,
2080  b * output_block_dim, output_block_dim,
2081  0, input_block_dim);
2082  // Update the parameters.
2083  param_block.AddMatMat(learning_rate_, out_deriv_block, kTrans,
2084  in_value_block, kNoTrans, 1.0);
2085  }
2086 }
2087 
2088 void BlockAffineComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, //in_info,
2089  const ChunkInfo &, //out_info,
2090  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
2091  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //out_value,
2092  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2093  Component *to_update_in,
2094  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2095 
2096  // This code mirrors the code in Propagate().
2097  int32 num_frames = in_value.NumRows();
2098  BlockAffineComponent *to_update = dynamic_cast<BlockAffineComponent*>(
2099  to_update_in);
2100  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), InputDim());
2101  int32 input_block_dim = linear_params_.NumCols(),
2102  output_block_dim = linear_params_.NumRows() / num_blocks_;
2103  KALDI_ASSERT(in_value.NumCols() == input_block_dim * num_blocks_);
2104  KALDI_ASSERT(out_deriv.NumCols() == output_block_dim * num_blocks_);
2105 
2106  for (int32 b = 0; b < num_blocks_; b++) {
2107  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_block(in_value, 0, num_frames,
2108  b * input_block_dim,
2109  input_block_dim),
2110  in_deriv_block(*in_deriv, 0, num_frames,
2111  b * input_block_dim, input_block_dim),
2112  out_deriv_block(out_deriv, 0, num_frames,
2113  b * output_block_dim, output_block_dim),
2114  param_block(linear_params_,
2115  b * output_block_dim, output_block_dim,
2116  0, input_block_dim);
2117 
2118  // Propagate the derivative back to the input.
2119  in_deriv_block.AddMatMat(1.0, out_deriv_block, kNoTrans,
2120  param_block, kNoTrans, 0.0);
2121  }
2122  if (to_update != NULL)
2123  to_update->Update(in_value, out_deriv);
2124 }
2125 
2126 
2127 void BlockAffineComponent::Init(BaseFloat learning_rate,
2128  int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim,
2129  BaseFloat param_stddev,
2130  BaseFloat bias_stddev,
2131  int32 num_blocks) {
2132  UpdatableComponent::Init(learning_rate);
2133  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim > 0 && input_dim > 0 && param_stddev >= 0.0);
2134  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim % num_blocks == 0 && output_dim % num_blocks == 0);
2135 
2136  linear_params_.Resize(output_dim, input_dim / num_blocks);
2137  bias_params_.Resize(output_dim);
2138 
2139  linear_params_.SetRandn(); // sets to random normally distributed noise.
2140  linear_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
2141  bias_params_.SetRandn();
2142  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
2143  num_blocks_ = num_blocks;
2144 }

2305 
2306 void BlockAffineComponentPreconditioned::Update(
2307  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
2308  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
2309  if (is_gradient_) {
2310  UpdateSimple(in_value, out_deriv);
2311  // does the baseline update with no preconditioning.
2312  return;
2313  }
2314  int32 input_block_dim = linear_params_.NumCols(),
2315  output_block_dim = linear_params_.NumRows() / num_blocks_,
2316  num_frames = in_value.NumRows();
2317 
2318  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_temp(num_frames, input_block_dim + 1, kUndefined),
2319  in_value_precon(num_frames, input_block_dim + 1, kUndefined);
2320  in_value_temp.Set(1.0); // so last row will have value 1.0.
2321  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_temp_part(in_value_temp, 0, num_frames,
2322  0, input_block_dim); // all but last 1.0
2323  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_precon_part(in_value_precon, 0, num_frames,
2324  0, input_block_dim);
2325  CuVector<BaseFloat> precon_ones(num_frames);
2326  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_precon(num_frames, output_block_dim, kUndefined);
2327 
2328  for (int32 b = 0; b < num_blocks_; b++) {
2329  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_value_block(in_value, 0, num_frames,
2330  b * input_block_dim,
2331  input_block_dim),
2332  out_deriv_block(out_deriv, 0, num_frames,
2333  b * output_block_dim, output_block_dim),
2334  param_block(linear_params_,
2335  b * output_block_dim, output_block_dim,
2336  0, input_block_dim);
2337  in_value_temp_part.CopyFromMat(in_value_block);
2338 
2339  PreconditionDirectionsAlphaRescaled(in_value_temp, alpha_,
2340  &in_value_precon);
2341  PreconditionDirectionsAlphaRescaled(out_deriv_block, alpha_,
2342  &out_deriv_precon);
2343 
2344 
2345  // Update the parameters.
2346  param_block.AddMatMat(learning_rate_, out_deriv_precon, kTrans,
2347  in_value_precon_part, kNoTrans, 1.0);
2348  precon_ones.CopyColFromMat(in_value_precon, input_block_dim);
2349  bias_params_.Range(b * output_block_dim, output_block_dim).
2350  AddMatVec(learning_rate_, out_deriv_precon, kTrans,
2351  precon_ones, 1.0);
2352  }
2353 }

2418 void SumGroupComponent::Init(const std::vector<int32> &sizes) {
2419  KALDI_ASSERT(!sizes.empty());
2420  std::vector<Int32Pair> cpu_vec(sizes.size());
2421  std::vector<int32> reverse_cpu_vec;
2422  int32 cur_index = 0;
2423  for (size_t i = 0; i < sizes.size(); i++) {
2424  KALDI_ASSERT(sizes[i] > 0);
2425  cpu_vec[i].first = cur_index;
2426  cpu_vec[i].second = cur_index + sizes[i];
2427  cur_index += sizes[i];
2428  for (int32 j = cpu_vec[i].first; j < cpu_vec[i].second; j++)
2429  reverse_cpu_vec.push_back(i);
2430  }
2431  this->indexes_ = cpu_vec;
2432  this->reverse_indexes_ = reverse_cpu_vec;
2433  this->input_dim_ = cur_index;
2434  this->output_dim_ = sizes.size();
2435 }

2445  this->Init(sizes);

2471 void SumGroupComponent::GetSizes(std::vector<int32> *sizes) const {
2472  std::vector<Int32Pair> indexes;
2473  indexes_.CopyToVec(&indexes);
2474  sizes->resize(indexes.size());
2475  for (size_t i = 0; i < indexes.size(); i++) {
2476  (*sizes)[i] = indexes[i].second - indexes[i].first;
2477  if (i == 0) { KALDI_ASSERT(indexes[i].first == 0); }
2478  else { KALDI_ASSERT(indexes[i].first == indexes[i-1].second); }
2479  KALDI_ASSERT(indexes[i].second > indexes[i].first);
2480  (*sizes)[i] = indexes[i].second - indexes[i].first;
2481  }
2482 }

2488  this->GetSizes(&sizes);
2489  WriteIntegerVector(os, binary, sizes);
2490  WriteToken(os, binary, "</SumGroupComponent>");
2491 }

2540 // e.g. args == "input-dim=10 left-context=2 right-context=2
2541 void SpliceComponent::InitFromString(std::string args) {
2542  std::string orig_args(args);
2543  int32 input_dim, left_context, right_context;
2544  std::vector <int32> context;
2545  bool in_dim_ok = ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &input_dim);
2546  bool context_ok = ParseFromString("context", &args, &context);
2547  bool left_right_context_ok = ParseFromString("left-context", &args,
2548  &left_context) &&
2549  ParseFromString("right-context", &args,
2550  &right_context);
2551  int32 const_component_dim = 0;
2552  ParseFromString("const-component-dim", &args, &const_component_dim);
2553 
2554  if (!(in_dim_ok && (context_ok || left_right_context_ok)) ||
2555  !args.empty() || input_dim <= 0)
2556  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2557  << Type() << ": \"" << orig_args << "\"";
2558  if (left_right_context_ok) {
2559  KALDI_ASSERT(context.size() == 0);
2560  for (int32 i = -left_context; i <= right_context; i++)
2561  context.push_back(i);
2562  }
2563  Init(input_dim, context, const_component_dim);
2564 }

2566 int32 SpliceComponent::OutputDim() const {
2567  return (input_dim_ - const_component_dim_)
2568  * (context_.size())
2569  + const_component_dim_;
2570 }

2572 int32 ChunkInfo::GetIndex(int32 offset) const {
2573  if (offsets_.empty()) { // if data is contiguous
2574  KALDI_ASSERT((offset <= last_offset_) && (offset >= first_offset_));
2575  return offset - first_offset_;
2576  } else {
2577  std::vector<int32>::const_iterator iter =
2578  std::lower_bound(offsets_.begin(), offsets_.end(), offset);
2579  // make sure offset is present in the vector
2580  KALDI_ASSERT(iter != offsets_.end() && *iter == offset);
2581  return static_cast<int32>(iter - offsets_.begin());
2582  }
2583 }
2584 
2585 int32 ChunkInfo::GetOffset(int32 index) const {
2586  if (offsets_.empty()) { // if data is contiguous
2587  int32 offset = index + first_offset_; // just offset by the first_offset_
2588  KALDI_ASSERT((offset <= last_offset_) && (offset >= first_offset_));
2589  return offset;
2590  } else {
2591  KALDI_ASSERT((index >= 0) && (index < offsets_.size()));
2592  return offsets_[index];
2593  }
2594 }
2595 
2596 void ChunkInfo::Check() const {
2597  // Checking sanity of the ChunkInfo object
2598  KALDI_ASSERT((feat_dim_ > 0) && (num_chunks_ > 0));
2599 
2600  if (! offsets_.empty()) {
2601  KALDI_ASSERT((first_offset_ == offsets_.front()) &&
2602  (last_offset_ == offsets_.back()));
2603  } else {
2604  KALDI_ASSERT((first_offset_ >= 0) && (last_offset_ >= first_offset_));
2605  // asserting the chunk is not contiguous, as offsets is not empty
2606  KALDI_ASSERT ( last_offset_ - first_offset_ + 1 > offsets_.size() );
2607  }
2608  KALDI_ASSERT(NumRows() % num_chunks_ == 0);
2609 
2610 }
2611 
2612 void ChunkInfo::CheckSize(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &mat) const {
2613  KALDI_ASSERT((mat.NumRows() == NumRows()) && (mat.NumCols() == NumCols()));
2614 }
2615 
2616 /*
2617  * This method was used for debugging, make changes in nnet-component.h to
2618  * expose it
2619 void ChunkInfo::ToString() const {
2620  KALDI_LOG << "feat_dim " << feat_dim_;
2621  KALDI_LOG << "num_chunks " << num_chunks_;
2622  KALDI_LOG << "first_index " << first_offset_;
2623  KALDI_LOG << "last_index " << last_offset_;
2624  for (size_t i = 0; i < offsets_.size(); i++)
2625  KALDI_LOG << offsets_[i];
2626 }
2627 */
