2629 
2630 void SpliceComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
2631  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
2632  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2633  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2634 
2635  // Check the inputs are correct and resize output
2636  in_info.Check();
2637  out_info.Check();
2638  in_info.CheckSize(in);
2639  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
2640  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
2641 
2642  int32 in_chunk_size = in_info.ChunkSize(),
2643  out_chunk_size = out_info.ChunkSize(),
2644  input_dim = in_info.NumCols();
2645 
2646  if (out_chunk_size <= 0)
2647  KALDI_ERR << "Splicing features: output will have zero dimension. "
2648  << "Probably a code error.";
2649 
2650  // 'indexes' is, for each index from 0 to context_.size() - 1,
2651  // then for each row of "out", the corresponding row of "in" that we copy from
2652  int32 num_splice = context_.size();
2653  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > indexes(num_splice);
2654  for (int32 c = 0; c < num_splice; c++)
2655  indexes[c].resize(out->NumRows());
2656  // const_component_dim_ != 0, "const_indexes" will be used to determine which
2657  // row of "in" we copy the last part of each row of "out" from (this part is
2658  // not subject to splicing, it's assumed constant for each frame of "input".
2659  int32 const_dim = const_component_dim_;
2660  std::vector<int32> const_indexes(const_dim == 0 ? 0 : out->NumRows());
2661 
2662  for (int32 chunk = 0; chunk < in_info.NumChunks(); chunk++) {
2663  if (chunk == 0) {
2664  // this branch could be used for all chunks in the matrix,
2665  // but is restricted to chunk 0 for efficiency reasons
2666  for (int32 c = 0; c < num_splice; c++) {
2667  for (int32 out_index = 0; out_index < out_chunk_size; out_index++) {
2668  int32 out_offset = out_info.GetOffset(out_index);
2669  int32 in_index = in_info.GetIndex(out_offset + context_[c]);
2670  indexes[c][chunk * out_chunk_size + out_index] =
2671  chunk * in_chunk_size + in_index;
2672  }
2673  }
2674  } else { // just copy the indices from the previous chunk
2675  // and offset these by input chunk size
2676  for (int32 c = 0; c < num_splice; c++) {
2677  for (int32 out_index = 0; out_index < out_chunk_size; out_index++) {
2678  int32 last_value = indexes[c][(chunk-1) * out_chunk_size + out_index];
2679  indexes[c][chunk * out_chunk_size + out_index] =
2680  (last_value == -1 ? -1 : last_value + in_chunk_size);
2681  }
2682  }
2683  }
2684  if (const_dim != 0) {
2685  for (int32 out_index = 0; out_index < out_chunk_size; out_index++)
2686  const_indexes[chunk * out_chunk_size + out_index] =
2687  chunk * in_chunk_size + out_index; // there is
2688  // an arbitrariness here; since we assume the const_component
2689  // is constant within a chunk, it doesn't matter from where we copy.
2690  }
2691  }
2692 
2693 
2694  for (int32 c = 0; c < num_splice; c++) {
2695  int32 dim = input_dim - const_dim; // dimension we
2696  // are splicing
2697  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_part(in, 0, in.NumRows(),
2698  0, dim),
2699  out_part(*out, 0, out->NumRows(),
2700  c * dim, dim);
2701  CuArray<int32> cu_indexes(indexes[c]);
2702  out_part.CopyRows(in_part, cu_indexes);
2703  }
2704  if (const_dim != 0) {
2705  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_part(in, 0, in.NumRows(),
2706  in.NumCols() - const_dim, const_dim),
2707  out_part(*out, 0, out->NumRows(),
2708  out->NumCols() - const_dim, const_dim);
2709 
2710  CuArray<int32> cu_const_indexes(const_indexes);
2711  out_part.CopyRows(in_part, cu_const_indexes);
2712  }
2713 }
2714 
2715 void SpliceComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
2716  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
2717  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // in_value,
2718  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value,
2719  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2720  Component *to_update,
2721  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2722  in_info.Check();
2723  out_info.Check();
2724  out_info.CheckSize(out_deriv);
2725  in_deriv->Resize(in_info.NumRows(), in_info.NumCols(), kUndefined);
2726  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
2727  int32 num_chunks = in_info.NumChunks();
2728  // rewrite backpropagate
2729 
2730  int32 out_chunk_size = out_info.ChunkSize(),
2731  in_chunk_size = in_info.ChunkSize(),
2732  output_dim = out_deriv.NumCols(),
2733  input_dim = InputDim();
2734 
2735  KALDI_ASSERT(OutputDim() == output_dim);
2736 
2737  int32 num_splice = context_.size(),
2738  const_dim = const_component_dim_;
2739  // 'indexes' is, for each index from 0 to num_splice - 1,
2740  // then for each row of "in_deriv", the corresponding row of "out_deriv" that
2741  // we add, or -1 if.
2742 
2743  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > indexes(num_splice);
2744  // const_dim != 0, "const_indexes" will be used to determine which
2745  // row of "in" we copy the last part of each row of "out" from (this part is
2746  // not subject to splicing, it's assumed constant for each frame of "input".
2747  std::vector<int32> const_indexes(const_dim == 0 ? 0 : in_deriv->NumRows(), -1);
2748 
2749  for (int32 c = 0; c < indexes.size(); c++)
2750  indexes[c].resize(in_deriv->NumRows(), -1); // set to -1 by default,
2751  // this gets interpreted by the CopyRows() code
2752  // as a signal to zero the output...
2753 
2754  int32 dim = input_dim - const_dim; // dimension we are splicing
2755  for (int32 chunk = 0; chunk < num_chunks; chunk++) {
2756  if (chunk == 0) { // this branch can be taken for all chunks, but is not
2757  // taken for efficiency reasons
2758  for (int32 c = 0; c < num_splice; c++) {
2759  for (int32 out_index = 0; out_index < out_chunk_size; out_index++) {
2760  int32 out_offset = out_info.GetOffset(out_index);
2761  int32 in_index = in_info.GetIndex(out_offset + context_[c]);
2762  indexes[c][chunk * in_chunk_size + in_index] =
2763  chunk * out_chunk_size + out_index;
2764  }
2765  }
2766  } else { // just copy the indexes from the previous chunk
2767  for (int32 c = 0; c < num_splice; c++) {
2768  for (int32 in_index = 0; in_index < in_chunk_size; in_index++) {
2769  int32 last_value = indexes[c][(chunk-1) * in_chunk_size + in_index];
2770  indexes[c][chunk * in_chunk_size + in_index] =
2771  (last_value == -1 ? -1 : last_value + out_chunk_size);
2772  }
2773  }
2774  }
2775  // this code corresponds to the way the forward propagation works; see
2776  // comments there.
2777  if (const_dim != 0) {
2778  for (int32 out_index = 0; out_index < out_chunk_size; out_index++) {
2779  const_indexes[chunk * in_chunk_size + out_index] =
2780  chunk * out_chunk_size + out_index;
2781  }
2782  }
2783  }
2784 
2785  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> temp_mat(in_deriv->NumRows(), dim, kUndefined);
2786 
2787  for (int32 c = 0; c < num_splice; c++) {
2788  CuArray<int32> cu_indexes(indexes[c]);
2789  int32 dim = input_dim - const_dim; // dimension we
2790  // are splicing
2791  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_part(out_deriv, 0, out_deriv.NumRows(),
2792  c * dim, dim),
2793  in_deriv_part(*in_deriv, 0, in_deriv->NumRows(),
2794  0, dim);
2795  if (c == 0) {
2796  in_deriv_part.CopyRows(out_deriv_part, cu_indexes);
2797  } else {
2798  temp_mat.CopyRows(out_deriv_part, cu_indexes);
2799  in_deriv_part.AddMat(1.0, temp_mat);
2800  }
2801  }
2802  if (const_dim != 0) {
2803  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_part(out_deriv, 0, out_deriv.NumRows(),
2804  out_deriv.NumCols() - const_dim,
2805  const_dim),
2806  in_deriv_part(*in_deriv, 0, in_deriv->NumRows(),
2807  in_deriv->NumCols() - const_dim, const_dim);
2808  CuArray<int32> cu_const_indexes(const_indexes);
2809  in_deriv_part.CopyRows(out_deriv_part, cu_const_indexes);
2810  }
2811 }
2812 
2813 Component *SpliceComponent::Copy() const {
2814  SpliceComponent *ans = new SpliceComponent();
2815  ans->input_dim_ = input_dim_;
2816  ans->context_ = context_;
2817  ans->const_component_dim_ = const_component_dim_;
2818  return ans;
2819 }

2821 void SpliceComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
2822  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, "<SpliceComponent>", "<InputDim>");
2823  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &input_dim_);
2824  std::string token;
2825  ReadToken(is, false, &token);
2826  if (token == "<LeftContext>") {
2827  int32 left_context=0, right_context=0;
2828  std::vector<int32> context;
2829  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &left_context);
2830  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<RightContext>");
2831  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &right_context);
2832  for (int32 i = -1 * left_context; i <= right_context; i++)
2833  context.push_back(i);
2834  context_ = context;
2835  } else if (token == "<Context>") {
2836  ReadIntegerVector(is, binary, &context_);
2837  } else {
2838  KALDI_ERR << "Unknown token" << token
2839  << ", the model might be corrupted";
2840  }
2841  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<ConstComponentDim>");
2842  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &const_component_dim_);
2843  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</SpliceComponent>");
2844 }

2848  WriteToken(os, binary, "<InputDim>");
2849  WriteBasicType(os, binary, input_dim_);
2850  WriteToken(os, binary, "<Context>");
2851  WriteIntegerVector(os, binary, context_);
2852  WriteToken(os, binary, "<ConstComponentDim>");
2853  WriteBasicType(os, binary, const_component_dim_);
2854  WriteToken(os, binary, "</SpliceComponent>");
2855 }

2876 void SpliceMaxComponent::InitFromString(std::string args) {

2878  int32 dim, left_context, right_context;
2879  std::vector <int32> context;
2880  bool dim_ok = ParseFromString("dim", &args, &dim);
2881  bool context_ok = ParseFromString("context", &args, &context);
2882  bool left_right_context_ok = ParseFromString("left-context",
2883  &args, &left_context) &&
2884  ParseFromString("right-context", &args,
2885  &right_context);

2888  !args.empty() || dim <= 0)
2889  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
2890  << Type() << ": \"" << orig_args << "\"";

2892  KALDI_ASSERT(context.size() == 0);
2893  for (int32 i = -1 * left_context; i <= right_context; i++)
2894  context.push_back(i);
2895  }
2896  Init(dim, context);

2900 void SpliceMaxComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
2901  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
2902  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
2903  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
2904  in_info.Check();
2905  out_info.Check();
2906  in_info.CheckSize(in);
2907  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
2908  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
2909  int32 in_chunk_size = in_info.ChunkSize(),
2910  out_chunk_size = out_info.ChunkSize(),
2911  dim = in_info.NumCols();
2912 
2913  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> input_chunk_part(out_chunk_size, dim);
2914  for (int32 chunk = 0; chunk < in_info.NumChunks(); chunk++) {
2915  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> input_chunk(in,
2916  chunk * in_chunk_size, in_chunk_size,
2917  0, dim),
2918  output_chunk(*out,
2919  chunk * out_chunk_size,
2920  out_chunk_size, 0, dim);
2921  for (int32 offset = 0; offset < context_.size(); offset++) {
2922  // computing the indices to copy into input_chunk_part from input_chunk
2923  // copy the rows of the input matrix which correspond to the current
2924  // context index
2925  std::vector<int32> input_chunk_inds(out_chunk_size);
2926  for (int32 i = 0; i < out_chunk_size; i++) {
2927  int32 out_chunk_ind = i;
2928  int32 out_chunk_offset =
2929  out_info.GetOffset(out_chunk_ind);
2930  input_chunk_inds[i] =
2931  in_info.GetIndex(out_chunk_offset + context_[offset]);
2932  }
2933  CuArray<int32> cu_chunk_inds(input_chunk_inds);
2934  input_chunk_part.CopyRows(input_chunk, cu_chunk_inds);
2935  if (offset == 0) {
2936  output_chunk.CopyFromMat(input_chunk_part);
2937  } else {
2938  output_chunk.Max(input_chunk_part);
2939  }
2940  }
2941  }
2942 }
2943 
2944 void SpliceMaxComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
2945  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
2946  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
2947  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, // out_value
2948  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
2949  Component *to_update,
2950  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
2951  in_info.Check();
2952  out_info.Check();
2953  in_info.CheckSize(in_value);
2954  out_info.CheckSize(out_deriv);
2955  in_deriv->Resize(in_info.NumRows(), in_info.NumCols());
2956  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
2957 
2958  int32 out_chunk_size = out_info.ChunkSize(),
2959  in_chunk_size = in_info.ChunkSize(),
2960  dim = out_deriv.NumCols();
2961 
2962  KALDI_ASSERT(dim == InputDim());
2963 
2964  for (int32 chunk = 0; chunk < in_info.NumChunks(); chunk++) {
2965  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_deriv_chunk(*in_deriv,
2966  chunk * in_chunk_size,
2967  in_chunk_size,
2968  0, dim),
2969  in_value_chunk(in_value,
2970  chunk * in_chunk_size,
2971  in_chunk_size,
2972  0, dim),
2973  out_deriv_chunk(out_deriv,
2974  chunk * out_chunk_size,
2975  out_chunk_size,
2976  0, dim);
2977  for (int32 r = 0; r < out_deriv_chunk.NumRows(); r++) {
2978  int32 out_chunk_ind = r;
2979  int32 out_chunk_offset =
2980  out_info.GetOffset(out_chunk_ind);
2981 
2982  for (int32 c = 0; c < dim; c++) {
2983  int32 in_r_max = -1;
2984  BaseFloat max_input = -std::numeric_limits<BaseFloat>::infinity();
2985  for (int32 context_ind = 0;
2986  context_ind < context_.size(); context_ind++) {
2987  int32 in_r =
2988  in_info.GetIndex(out_chunk_offset + context_[context_ind]);
2989  BaseFloat input = in_value_chunk(in_r, c);
2990  if (input > max_input) {
2991  max_input = input;
2992  in_r_max = in_r;
2993  }
2994  }
2995  KALDI_ASSERT(in_r_max != -1);
2996  (*in_deriv)(in_r_max, c) += out_deriv_chunk(r, c);
2997  }
2998  }
2999  }
3000 }

3004  ans->Init(dim_, context_);
3005  return ans;

3048 void DctComponent::Init(int32 dim, int32 dct_dim, bool reorder, int32 dct_keep_dim) {
3049  int dct_keep_dim_ = (dct_keep_dim > 0) ? dct_keep_dim : dct_dim;
3050

3052  KALDI_ASSERT(dim % dct_dim == 0); // dct_dim must divide dim.
3053  KALDI_ASSERT(dct_dim >= dct_keep_dim_);
3054  dim_ = dim;
3055  dct_mat_.Resize(dct_keep_dim_, dct_dim);
3056  reorder_ = reorder;
3057  Matrix<BaseFloat> dct_mat(dct_keep_dim_, dct_dim);
3058  ComputeDctMatrix(&dct_mat);
3059  dct_mat_ = dct_mat;
3060 }

3067  bool reorder = false;
3068

3070  ok = ParseFromString("dct-dim", &args, &dct_dim) && ok;
3071  ok = ParseFromString("reorder", &args, &reorder) && ok;
3072  ParseFromString("dct-keep-dim", &args, &dct_keep_dim);
3073 
3074  if (!ok || !args.empty() || dim <= 0 || dct_dim <= 0 || dct_keep_dim < 0)
3075  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
3076  << Type() << ": \"" << orig_args << "\"";
3077  Init(dim, dct_dim, reorder, dct_keep_dim);

3079 
3080 void DctComponent::Reorder(CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *mat, bool reverse) const {
3081  // reorders into contiguous blocks of dize "dct_dim_", assuming that
3082  // such blocks were interlaced before. if reverse==true, does the
3083  // reverse.
3084  int32 dct_dim = dct_mat_.NumCols(),
3085  dct_keep_dim = dct_mat_.NumRows(),
3086  block_size_in = dim_ / dct_dim,
3087  block_size_out = dct_keep_dim;
3088 
3089  //This does not necesarily needs to be true anymore -- output must be reordered as well, but the dimension differs...
3090  //KALDI_ASSERT(mat->NumCols() == dim_);
3091  if (reverse) std::swap(block_size_in, block_size_out);
3092 
3093  CuVector<BaseFloat> temp(mat->NumCols());
3094  for (int32 i = 0; i < mat->NumRows(); i++) {
3095  CuSubVector<BaseFloat> row(*mat, i);
3096  int32 num_blocks_in = block_size_out;
3097  for (int32 b = 0; b < num_blocks_in; b++) {
3098  for (int32 j = 0; j < block_size_in; j++) {
3099  temp(j * block_size_out + b) = row(b * block_size_in + j);
3100  }
3101  }
3102  row.CopyFromVec(temp);
3103  }
3104 }
3105 
3106 void DctComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
3107  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
3108  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3109  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3110  KALDI_ASSERT(in.NumCols() == InputDim());
3111  int32 dct_dim = dct_mat_.NumCols(),
3112  dct_keep_dim = dct_mat_.NumRows(),
3113  num_rows = in.NumRows(),
3114  num_chunks = dim_ / dct_dim;
3115 
3116  in_info.CheckSize(in);
3117  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
3118  KALDI_ASSERT(num_rows == out_info.NumRows());
3119  KALDI_ASSERT(num_chunks * dct_keep_dim == out_info.NumCols());
3120 
3121  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> in_tmp;
3122  if (reorder_) {
3123  in_tmp = in;
3124  Reorder(&in_tmp, false);
3125  }
3126 
3127  for (int32 chunk = 0; chunk < num_chunks; chunk++) {
3128  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_mat(reorder_ ? in_tmp : in,
3129  0, num_rows, dct_dim * chunk, dct_dim),
3130  out_mat(*out,
3131  0, num_rows, dct_keep_dim * chunk, dct_keep_dim);
3132 
3133  out_mat.AddMatMat(1.0, in_mat, kNoTrans, dct_mat_, kTrans, 0.0);
3134  }
3135  if (reorder_)
3136  Reorder(out, true);
3137 }
3138 
3139 void DctComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, //in_info,
3140  const ChunkInfo &, //out_info,
3141  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //in_value,
3142  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &, //out_value,
3143  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3144  Component *, //to_update,
3145  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3146  KALDI_ASSERT(out_deriv.NumCols() == OutputDim());
3147 
3148  int32 dct_dim = dct_mat_.NumCols(),
3149  dct_keep_dim = dct_mat_.NumRows(),
3150  num_chunks = dim_ / dct_dim,
3151  num_rows = out_deriv.NumRows();
3152 
3153  in_deriv->Resize(num_rows, dim_);
3154 
3155  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_tmp;
3156  if (reorder_) {
3157  out_deriv_tmp = out_deriv;
3158  Reorder(&out_deriv_tmp, false);
3159  }
3160  for (int32 chunk = 0; chunk < num_chunks; chunk++) {
3161  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_deriv_mat(*in_deriv,
3162  0, num_rows, dct_dim * chunk, dct_dim),
3163  out_deriv_mat(reorder_ ? out_deriv_tmp : out_deriv,
3164  0, num_rows, dct_keep_dim * chunk, dct_keep_dim);
3165 
3166  // Note: in the reverse direction the DCT matrix is transposed. This is
3167  // normal when computing derivatives; the necessity for the transpose is
3168  // obvious if you consider what happens when the input and output dims
3169  // differ.
3170  in_deriv_mat.AddMatMat(1.0, out_deriv_mat, kNoTrans,
3171  dct_mat_, kNoTrans, 0.0);
3172  }
3173  if (reorder_)
3174  Reorder(in_deriv, true);
3175 }

3576 void DropoutComponent::Init(int32 dim,
3577  BaseFloat dropout_proportion,
3578  BaseFloat dropout_scale){
3579  dim_ = dim;
3580  dropout_proportion_ = dropout_proportion;
3581  dropout_scale_ = dropout_scale;

3583 
3584 void DropoutComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
3585  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
3586  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3587  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3588  in_info.CheckSize(in);
3589  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
3590  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
3591  KALDI_ASSERT(in.NumCols() == this->InputDim());
3592 
3593  BaseFloat dp = dropout_proportion_;
3594  KALDI_ASSERT(dp < 1.0 && dp >= 0.0);
3595  KALDI_ASSERT(dropout_scale_ <= 1.0 && dropout_scale_ >= 0.0);
3596 
3597  BaseFloat low_scale = dropout_scale_,
3598  high_scale = (1.0 - (dp * low_scale)) / (1.0 - dp),
3599  average = (low_scale * dp) +
3600  (high_scale * (1.0 - dp));
3601  KALDI_ASSERT(fabs(average - 1.0) < 0.01);
3602 
3603  // This const_cast is only safe assuming you don't attempt
3604  // to use multi-threaded code with the GPU.
3605  const_cast<CuRand<BaseFloat>&>(random_generator_).RandUniform(out);
3606 
3607 
3608  out->Add(-dp); // now, a proportion "dp" will be <0.0
3609  out->ApplyHeaviside(); // apply the function (x>0?1:0). Now, a proportion "dp" will
3610  // be zero and (1-dp) will be 1.0.
3611  if ((high_scale - low_scale) != 1.0)
3612  out->Scale(high_scale - low_scale); // now, "dp" are 0 and (1-dp) are "high_scale-low_scale".
3613  if (low_scale != 0.0)
3614  out->Add(low_scale); // now "dp" equal "low_scale" and (1.0-dp) equal "high_scale".
3615 
3616  out->MulElements(in);
3617 }
3618 
3619 void DropoutComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, //in_info,
3620  const ChunkInfo &, //out_info,
3621  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
3622  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
3623  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
3624  Component *, //to_update
3625  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
3626  KALDI_ASSERT(SameDim(in_value, out_value) && SameDim(in_value, out_deriv));
3627  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), out_deriv.NumCols());
3628  in_deriv->AddMatMatDivMat(out_deriv, out_value, in_value);
3629 }

3632  return new DropoutComponent(dim_,
3633  dropout_proportion_,
3634  dropout_scale_);
3635 }

3695 Convolutional1dComponent::Convolutional1dComponent(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &filter_params,
3696  const CuVectorBase<BaseFloat> &bias_params,
3697  BaseFloat learning_rate):
3698  UpdatableComponent(learning_rate),
3699  filter_params_(filter_params),
3700  bias_params_(bias_params) {
3701  KALDI_ASSERT(filter_params.NumRows() == bias_params.Dim() &&
3702  bias_params.Dim() != 0);
3703  appended_conv_ = false;
3704  is_gradient_ = false;
3705 }
3706 
3707 // aquire input dim
3708 int32 Convolutional1dComponent::InputDim() const {
3709  int32 filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
3710  int32 num_splice = filter_dim / patch_dim_;
3711  return patch_stride_ * num_splice;
3712 }
3713 
3714 // aquire output dim
3715 int32 Convolutional1dComponent::OutputDim() const {
3716  int32 num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows();
3717  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
3718  return num_patches * num_filters;
3719 }
3720 
3721 // initialize the component using hyperparameters
3722 void Convolutional1dComponent::Init(BaseFloat learning_rate,
3723  int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim,
3724  int32 patch_dim, int32 patch_step,
3725  int32 patch_stride, BaseFloat param_stddev,
3726  BaseFloat bias_stddev, bool appended_conv) {
3727  UpdatableComponent::Init(learning_rate);
3728  patch_dim_ = patch_dim;
3729  patch_step_ = patch_step;
3730  patch_stride_ = patch_stride;
3731  appended_conv_ = appended_conv;
3732  int32 num_splice = input_dim / patch_stride;
3733  int32 filter_dim = num_splice * patch_dim;
3734  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride - patch_dim) / patch_step;
3735  int32 num_filters = output_dim / num_patches;
3736  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim % patch_stride == 0);
3737  KALDI_ASSERT((patch_stride - patch_dim) % patch_step == 0);
3738  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim % num_patches == 0);
3739 
3740  filter_params_.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim);
3741  bias_params_.Resize(num_filters);
3742  KALDI_ASSERT(param_stddev >= 0.0 && bias_stddev >= 0.0);
3743  filter_params_.SetRandn();
3744  filter_params_.Scale(param_stddev);
3745  bias_params_.SetRandn();
3746  bias_params_.Scale(bias_stddev);
3747 }
3748 
3749 // initialize the component using predefined matrix file
3750 void Convolutional1dComponent::Init(BaseFloat learning_rate, int32 patch_dim,
3751  int32 patch_step, int32 patch_stride,
3752  std::string matrix_filename,
3753  bool appended_conv) {
3754  UpdatableComponent::Init(learning_rate);
3755  patch_dim_ = patch_dim;
3756  patch_step_ = patch_step;
3757  patch_stride_ = patch_stride;
3758  appended_conv_ = appended_conv;
3759  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mat;
3760  ReadKaldiObject(matrix_filename, &mat);
3761  KALDI_ASSERT(mat.NumCols() >= 2);
3762  int32 filter_dim = mat.NumCols() - 1, num_filters = mat.NumRows();
3763  filter_params_.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim);
3764  bias_params_.Resize(num_filters);
3765  filter_params_.CopyFromMat(mat.Range(0, num_filters, 0, filter_dim));
3766  bias_params_.CopyColFromMat(mat, filter_dim);
3767 }
3768 
3769 // resize the component, setting the parameters to zero, while
3770 // leaving any other configuration values the same
3771 void Convolutional1dComponent::Resize(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim) {
3772  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim > 0 && output_dim > 0);
3773  int32 num_splice = input_dim / patch_stride_;
3774  int32 filter_dim = num_splice * patch_dim_;
3775  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
3776  int32 num_filters = output_dim / num_patches;
3777  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim % patch_stride_ == 0);
3778  KALDI_ASSERT((patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) % patch_step_ == 0);
3779  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim % num_patches == 0);
3780  filter_params_.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim);
3781  bias_params_.Resize(num_filters);
3782 }

3784 // display information about component
3785 std::string Convolutional1dComponent::Info() const {
3786  std::stringstream stream;
3787  BaseFloat filter_params_size = static_cast<BaseFloat>(filter_params_.NumRows())
3788  * static_cast<BaseFloat>(filter_params_.NumCols());
3789  BaseFloat filter_stddev =
3790  std::sqrt(TraceMatMat(filter_params_, filter_params_, kTrans) /
3791  filter_params_size),
3792  bias_stddev = std::sqrt(VecVec(bias_params_, bias_params_) /
3793  bias_params_.Dim());
3794 
3795  int32 num_splice = InputDim() / patch_stride_;
3796  int32 filter_dim = num_splice * patch_dim_;
3797  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
3798  int32 num_filters = OutputDim() / num_patches;
3799 
3800  stream << Type() << ", input-dim=" << InputDim()
3801  << ", output-dim=" << OutputDim()
3802  << ", num-splice=" << num_splice
3803  << ", num-patches=" << num_patches
3804  << ", num-filters=" << num_filters
3805  << ", filter-dim=" << filter_dim
3806  << ", filter-params-stddev=" << filter_stddev
3807  << ", bias-params-stddev=" << bias_stddev
3808  << ", appended-conv=" << appended_conv_
3809  << ", learning-rate=" << LearningRate();
3810  return stream.str();
3811 }

3813 // initialize the component using configuration file
3814 void Convolutional1dComponent::InitFromString(std::string args) {
3815  std::string orig_args(args);
3816  bool ok = true, appended_conv = false;
3817  BaseFloat learning_rate = learning_rate_;
3818  std::string matrix_filename;
3819  int32 input_dim = -1, output_dim = -1;
3820  int32 patch_dim = -1, patch_step = -1, patch_stride = -1;
3821  ParseFromString("learning-rate", &args, &learning_rate);
3822  ParseFromString("appended-conv", &args, &appended_conv);
3823  ok = ok && ParseFromString("patch-dim", &args, &patch_dim);
3824  ok = ok && ParseFromString("patch-step", &args, &patch_step);
3825  ok = ok && ParseFromString("patch-stride", &args, &patch_stride);
3826  if (ParseFromString("matrix", &args, &matrix_filename)) {
3827  // initialize from prefined parameter matrix
3828  Init(learning_rate, patch_dim, patch_step, patch_stride,
3829  matrix_filename, appended_conv);
3830  if (ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &input_dim))
3831  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim == InputDim() &&
3832  "input-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
3833  if (ParseFromString("output-dim", &args, &output_dim))
3834  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim == OutputDim() &&
3835  "output-dim mismatch vs. matrix.");
3836  } else {
3837  // initialize from configuration
3838  ok = ok && ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &input_dim);
3839  ok = ok && ParseFromString("output-dim", &args, &output_dim);
3840  BaseFloat param_stddev = 1.0 / std::sqrt(input_dim), bias_stddev = 1.0;
3841  ParseFromString("param-stddev", &args, &param_stddev);
3842  ParseFromString("bias-stddev", &args, &bias_stddev);
3843  Init(learning_rate, input_dim, output_dim, patch_dim,
3844  patch_step, patch_stride, param_stddev, bias_stddev, appended_conv);
3845  }
3846  if (!args.empty())
3847  KALDI_ERR << "Could not process these elements in initializer: " << args;
3848  if (!ok)
3849  KALDI_ERR << "Bad initializer " << orig_args;
3850 }
3851 
3852 // propagation function
3853 
3854 /*
3855  In Convolution1dComponent, filter is defined $num-filters x $filter-dim,
3856  and bias vector B is defined by length $num-filters. The propatation is
3857  Y = X o A' + B
3858  where "o" is executing matrix-matrix convolution, which consists of a group
3859  of vector-matrix convolutions.
3860  For instance, the convolution of X(t) and the i-th filter A(i) is
3861  Y(t,i) = X(t) o A'(i) + B(i)
3862  The convolution used here is valid convolution. Meaning that the
3863  output of M o N is of dim |M| - |N| + 1, assuming M is not shorter then N.
3864 
3865  By default, input is arranged by
3866  x (time), y (channel), z(frequency)
3867  and output is arranged by
3868  x (time), y (frequency), z(channel).
3869  When appending convolutional1dcomponent, appended_conv_ should be
3870  set ture for the appended convolutional1dcomponent.
3871 */
3872 void Convolutional1dComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
3873  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
3874  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
3875  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
3876  in_info.CheckSize(in);
3877  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
3878  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
3879 
3880  // dims
3881  int32 num_splice = InputDim() / patch_stride_;
3882  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
3883  int32 num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows();
3884  int32 num_frames = in.NumRows();
3885  int32 filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
3886 
3891  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> patches(num_frames, filter_dim * num_patches, kUndefined);
3892  // column_map is indexed by the column-index of "patches",
3893  // and the value is the corresponding column-index of "in".
3894  std::vector<int32> column_map(filter_dim * num_patches);
3895 
3896  // build-up a column selection map
3897  for (int32 patch = 0, index = 0; patch < num_patches; patch++) {
3898  int32 fstride = patch * patch_step_;
3899  for (int32 splice = 0; splice < num_splice; splice++) {
3900  int32 cstride = splice * patch_stride_;
3901  for (int32 d = 0; d < patch_dim_; d++, index++) {
3902  if (appended_conv_)
3903  column_map[index] = (fstride + d) * num_splice + splice;
3904  else
3905  column_map[index] = fstride + cstride + d;
3906  }
3907  }
3908  }
3909  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(column_map);
3910  patches.CopyCols(in, cu_cols);
3911 
3912  //
3913  // compute filter activations
3914  //
3915 
3916  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > tgt_batch, patch_batch, filter_params_batch;
3917 
3918  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* filter_params_elem = new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
3919  filter_params_, 0, filter_params_.NumRows(), 0,
3920  filter_params_.NumCols());
3921 
3922  // form batch in vector container
3923  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
3924  // form batch in vector container. for filter_params_batch, all elements
3925  // point to the same copy filter_params_elem
3926  tgt_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out->ColRange(p * num_filters,
3927  num_filters)));
3928  patch_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(patches.ColRange(p * filter_dim,
3929  filter_dim)));
3930  filter_params_batch.push_back(filter_params_elem);
3931 
3932  tgt_batch[p]->AddVecToRows(1.0, bias_params_, 0.0); // add bias
3933  }
3934 
3935  // apply all filters
3936  AddMatMatBatched(1.0f, tgt_batch, patch_batch, kNoTrans, filter_params_batch,
3937  kTrans, 1.0f);
3938 
3939  // release memory
3940  delete filter_params_elem;
3941  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
3942  delete tgt_batch[p];
3943  delete patch_batch[p];
3944  }
3945 }
3946 
3947 // scale the parameters
3948 void Convolutional1dComponent::Scale(BaseFloat scale) {
3949  filter_params_.Scale(scale);
3950  bias_params_.Scale(scale);
3951 }

3953 // add another convolution component
3954 void Convolutional1dComponent::Add(BaseFloat alpha, const UpdatableComponent &other_in) {
3955  const Convolutional1dComponent *other =
3956  dynamic_cast<const Convolutional1dComponent*>(&other_in);
3957  KALDI_ASSERT(other != NULL);
3958  filter_params_.AddMat(alpha, other->filter_params_);
3959  bias_params_.AddVec(alpha, other->bias_params_);
3960 }
3961 
3962 /*
3963  This function does an operation similar to reversing a map,
3964  except it handles maps that are not one-to-one by outputting
3965  the reversed map as a vector of lists.
3966  @param[in] forward_indexes is a vector of int32, each of whose
3967  elements is between 0 and input_dim - 1.
3968  @param[in] input_dim. See definitions of forward_indexes and
3969  backward_indexes.
3970  @param[out] backward_indexes is a vector of dimension input_dim
3971  of lists, The list at (backward_indexes[i]) is a list
3972  of all indexes j such that forward_indexes[j] = i.
3973 */
3974 void Convolutional1dComponent::ReverseIndexes(const std::vector<int32> &forward_indexes,
3975  int32 input_dim,
3976  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > *backward_indexes) {
3977  int32 i, size = forward_indexes.size();
3978  int32 reserve_size = 2 + size / input_dim;
3979  backward_indexes->resize(input_dim);
3980  std::vector<std::vector<int32> >::iterator iter = backward_indexes->begin(),
3981  end = backward_indexes->end();
3982  for (; iter != end; ++iter)
3983  iter->reserve(reserve_size);
3984  for (int32 j = 0; j < forward_indexes.size(); j++) {
3985  i = forward_indexes[j];
3986  KALDI_ASSERT(i < input_dim);
3987  (*backward_indexes)[i].push_back(j);
3988  }
3989 }
3990 
3991 /*
3992  This function transforms a vector of lists into a list of vectors,
3993  padded with -1.
3994  @param[in] The input vector of lists. Let in.size() be D, and let
3995  the longest list length (i.e. the max of in[i].size()) be L.
3996  @param[out] The output list of vectors. The length of the list will
3997  be L, each vector-dimension will be D (i.e. out[i].size() == D),
3998  and if in[i] == j, then for some k we will have that
3999  out[k][j] = i. The output vectors are padded with -1
4000  where necessary if not all the input lists have the same side.
4001 */
4002 void Convolutional1dComponent::RearrangeIndexes(const std::vector<std::vector<int32> > &in,
4003  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > *out) {
4004  int32 D = in.size();
4005  int32 L = 0;
4006  for (int32 i = 0; i < D; i++)
4007  if (in[i].size() > L)
4008  L = in[i].size();
4009  out->resize(L);
4010  for (int32 i = 0; i < L; i++)
4011  (*out)[i].resize(D, -1);
4012  for (int32 i = 0; i < D; i++) {
4013  for (int32 j = 0; j < in[i].size(); j++) {
4014  (*out)[j][i] = in[i][j];
4015  }
4016  }
4017 }
4018 
4019 // back propagation function
4020 void Convolutional1dComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
4021  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
4022  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
4023  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
4024  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
4025  Component *to_update_in,
4026  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
4027  in_deriv->Resize(out_deriv.NumRows(), InputDim());
4028  Convolutional1dComponent *to_update = dynamic_cast<Convolutional1dComponent*>(to_update_in);
4029  int32 num_splice = InputDim() / patch_stride_;
4030  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
4031  int32 num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows();
4032  int32 num_frames = out_deriv.NumRows();
4033  int32 filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
4034 
4040  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> patches_deriv(num_frames, filter_dim * num_patches, kSetZero);
4041 
4042  //
4043  // backpropagate to vector of matrices
4044  // (corresponding to position of a filter)
4045  //
4046  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > patch_deriv_batch, out_deriv_batch,
4047  filter_params_batch;
4048 
4049  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* filter_params_elem = new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
4050  filter_params_, 0, filter_params_.NumRows(), 0,
4051  filter_params_.NumCols());
4052 
4053  // form batch in vector container
4054  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
4055  // form batch in vector container. for filter_params_batch, all elements
4056  // point to the same copy filter_params_elem
4057  patch_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(patches_deriv.ColRange(
4058  p * filter_dim, filter_dim)));
4059  out_deriv_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(
4060  p * num_filters, num_filters)));
4061  filter_params_batch.push_back(filter_params_elem);
4062  }
4063  AddMatMatBatched(1.0f, patch_deriv_batch, out_deriv_batch, kNoTrans,
4064  filter_params_batch, kNoTrans, 0.0f);
4065 
4066  // release memory
4067  delete filter_params_elem;
4068  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
4069  delete patch_deriv_batch[p];
4070  delete out_deriv_batch[p];
4071  }
4072 
4073  // sum the derivatives into in_deriv
4074  std::vector<int32> column_map(filter_dim * num_patches);
4075  for (int32 patch = 0, index = 0; patch < num_patches; patch++) {
4076  int32 fstride = patch * patch_step_;
4077  for (int32 splice = 0; splice < num_splice; splice++) {
4078  int32 cstride = splice * patch_stride_;
4079  for (int32 d = 0; d < patch_dim_; d++, index++) {
4080  if (appended_conv_)
4081  column_map[index] = (fstride + d) * num_splice + splice;
4082  else
4083  column_map[index] = fstride + cstride + d;
4084  }
4085  }
4086  }
4087  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > reversed_column_map;
4088  ReverseIndexes(column_map, InputDim(), &reversed_column_map);
4089  std::vector<std::vector<int32> > rearranged_column_map;
4090  RearrangeIndexes(reversed_column_map, &rearranged_column_map);
4091  for (int32 p = 0; p < rearranged_column_map.size(); p++) {
4092  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(rearranged_column_map[p]);
4093  in_deriv->AddCols(patches_deriv, cu_cols);
4094  }
4095 
4096  if (to_update != NULL) {
4097  // Next update the model (must do this 2nd so the derivatives we propagate
4098  // are accurate, in case this == to_update_in.)
4099  to_update->Update(in_value, out_deriv);
4100  }
4101 }

4105  SetLearningRate(1.0);
4106  }

4114 void Convolutional1dComponent::Read(std::istream &is, bool binary) {
4115  std::ostringstream ostr_beg, ostr_end;
4116  ostr_beg << "<" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "<Convolutional1dComponent>"
4117  ostr_end << "</" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "</Convolutional1dComponent>"
4118  // might not see the "<Convolutional1dComponent>" part because
4119  // of how ReadNew() works.
4120  ExpectOneOrTwoTokens(is, binary, ostr_beg.str(), "<LearningRate>");
4121  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &learning_rate_);
4122  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PatchDim>");
4123  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &patch_dim_);
4124  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PatchStep>");
4125  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &patch_step_);
4126  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<PatchStride>");
4127  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &patch_stride_);
4128  // back-compatibility
4129  std::string tok;
4130  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
4131  if (tok == "<AppendedConv>") {
4132  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &appended_conv_);
4133  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<FilterParams>");
4134  } else {
4135  appended_conv_ = false;
4136  KALDI_ASSERT(tok == "<FilterParams>");
4137  }
4138  filter_params_.Read(is, binary);
4139  ExpectToken(is, binary, "<BiasParams>");
4140  bias_params_.Read(is, binary);
4141  ReadToken(is, binary, &tok);
4142  if (tok == "<IsGradient>") {
4143  ReadBasicType(is, binary, &is_gradient_);
4144  ExpectToken(is, binary, ostr_end.str());
4145  } else {
4146  is_gradient_ = false;
4147  KALDI_ASSERT(tok == ostr_end.str());
4148  }
4149 }

4154  ostr_end << "</" << Type() << ">"; // e.g. "</Convolutional1dComponent>"
4155  WriteToken(os, binary, ostr_beg.str());
4156  WriteToken(os, binary, "<LearningRate>");
4157  WriteBasicType(os, binary, learning_rate_);
4158  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PatchDim>");
4159  WriteBasicType(os, binary, patch_dim_);
4160  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PatchStep>");
4161  WriteBasicType(os, binary, patch_step_);
4162  WriteToken(os, binary, "<PatchStride>");
4163  WriteBasicType(os, binary, patch_stride_);
4164  WriteToken(os, binary, "<AppendedConv>");
4165  WriteBasicType(os, binary, appended_conv_);
4166  WriteToken(os, binary, "<FilterParams>");

4172  WriteToken(os, binary, ostr_end.str());

4216 // update parameters
4217 void Convolutional1dComponent::Update(const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
4218  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv) {
4219  // useful dims
4220  int32 num_patches = 1 + (patch_stride_ - patch_dim_) / patch_step_;
4221  int32 num_filters = filter_params_.NumRows();
4222  int32 filter_dim = filter_params_.NumCols();
4223  int32 num_frames = in_value.NumRows();
4224  int32 num_splice = InputDim() / patch_stride_;
4225  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> filters_grad;
4226  CuVector<BaseFloat> bias_grad;
4227 
4232  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> patches(num_frames, filter_dim * num_patches, kUndefined);
4233  std::vector<int32> column_map(filter_dim * num_patches);
4234  for (int32 patch = 0, index = 0; patch < num_patches; patch++) {
4235  int32 fstride = patch * patch_step_;
4236  for (int32 splice = 0; splice < num_splice; splice++) {
4237  int32 cstride = splice * patch_stride_;
4238  for (int32 d = 0; d < patch_dim_; d++, index++) {
4239  if (appended_conv_)
4240  column_map[index] = (fstride + d) * num_splice + splice;
4241  else
4242  column_map[index] = fstride + cstride + d;
4243  }
4244  }
4245  }
4246  CuArray<int32> cu_cols(column_map);
4247  patches.CopyCols(in_value, cu_cols);
4248 
4249  //
4250  // calculate the gradient
4251  //
4252  filters_grad.Resize(num_filters, filter_dim, kSetZero); // reset
4253  bias_grad.Resize(num_filters, kSetZero); // reset
4254 
4255  //
4256  // use all the patches
4257  //
4258 
4259  // create a single large matrix holding the smaller matrices
4260  // from the vector container filters_grad_batch along the rows
4261  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> filters_grad_blocks_batch(
4262  num_patches * filters_grad.NumRows(), filters_grad.NumCols());
4263 
4264  std::vector<CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>* > filters_grad_batch, diff_patch_batch,
4265  patch_batch;
4266  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
4267  // form batch in vector container
4268  filters_grad_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(
4269  filters_grad_blocks_batch.RowRange(
4270  p * filters_grad.NumRows(),
4271  filters_grad.NumRows())));
4272  diff_patch_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(out_deriv.ColRange(
4273  p * num_filters, num_filters)));
4274  patch_batch.push_back(new CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat>(patches.ColRange(
4275  p * filter_dim, filter_dim)));
4276  }
4277 
4278  AddMatMatBatched(1.0f, filters_grad_batch, diff_patch_batch, kTrans, patch_batch,
4279  kNoTrans, 1.0f);
4280 
4281  // add the row blocks together to filters_grad
4282  filters_grad.AddMatBlocks(1.0, filters_grad_blocks_batch);
4283 
4284  // create a matrix holding the col blocks sum of out_deriv
4285  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> out_deriv_col_blocks_sum(out_deriv.NumRows(), num_filters);
4286 
4287  // add the col blocks together to out_deriv_col_blocks_sum
4288  out_deriv_col_blocks_sum.AddMatBlocks(1.0, out_deriv);
4289 
4290  bias_grad.AddRowSumMat(1.0, out_deriv_col_blocks_sum, 1.0);
4291 
4292  // release memory
4293  for (int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
4294  delete filters_grad_batch[p];
4295  delete diff_patch_batch[p];
4296  delete patch_batch[p];
4297  }
4298 
4299  //
4300  // update
4301  //
4302  filter_params_.AddMat(learning_rate_, filters_grad);
4303  bias_params_.AddVec(learning_rate_, bias_grad);
4304 }
4305 
4306 void MaxpoolingComponent::Init(int32 input_dim, int32 output_dim,
4307  int32 pool_size, int32 pool_stride) {
4308  input_dim_ = input_dim;
4309  output_dim_ = output_dim;
4310  pool_size_ = pool_size;
4311  pool_stride_ = pool_stride;
4312 
4313  // sanity check
4314  // number of patches
4315  KALDI_ASSERT(input_dim_ % pool_stride_ == 0);
4316  int32 num_patches = input_dim_ / pool_stride_;
4317  // number of pools
4318  KALDI_ASSERT(num_patches % pool_size_ == 0);
4319  int32 num_pools = num_patches / pool_size_;
4320  // check output dim
4321  KALDI_ASSERT(output_dim_ == num_pools * pool_stride_);
4322 }
4323 
4324 void MaxpoolingComponent::InitFromString(std::string args) {
4325  std::string orig_args(args);
4326  int32 input_dim = 0;
4327  int32 output_dim = 0;
4328  int32 pool_size = -1, pool_stride = -1;
4329  bool ok = true;
4330 
4331  ok = ok && ParseFromString("input-dim", &args, &input_dim);
4332  ok = ok && ParseFromString("output-dim", &args, &output_dim);
4333  ok = ok && ParseFromString("pool-size", &args, &pool_size);
4334  ok = ok && ParseFromString("pool-stride", &args, &pool_stride);
4335 
4336  KALDI_LOG << output_dim << " " << input_dim << " " << ok;
4337  KALDI_LOG << "Pool: " << pool_size << " "
4338  << pool_stride << " " << ok;
4339  if (!ok || !args.empty() || output_dim <= 0)
4340  KALDI_ERR << "Invalid initializer for layer of type "
4341  << Type() << ": \"" << orig_args << "\"";
4342  Init(input_dim, output_dim, pool_size, pool_stride);
4343 }
4344 
4345 /*
4346  Input and output of maxpooling component is arranged as
4347  x (time), y (frequency), z (channel)
4348  for efficient pooling.
4349  */
4350 void MaxpoolingComponent::Propagate(const ChunkInfo &in_info,
4351  const ChunkInfo &out_info,
4352  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in,
4353  CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> *out) const {
4354  in_info.CheckSize(in);
4355  out_info.CheckSize(*out);
4356  KALDI_ASSERT(in_info.NumChunks() == out_info.NumChunks());
4357  int32 num_patches = input_dim_ / pool_stride_;
4358  int32 num_pools = num_patches / pool_size_;
4359 
4360  // do the max-pooling
4361  for (int32 q = 0; q < num_pools; q++) {
4362  // get output buffer of the pool
4363  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> pool(out->ColRange(q * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4364  pool.Set(-1e20); // reset a large negative value
4365  for (int32 r = 0; r < pool_size_; r++) {
4366  // col-by-col block comparison pool
4367  int32 p = r + q * pool_size_;
4368  pool.Max(in.ColRange(p * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4369  }
4370  }
4371 }
4372 
4373 void MaxpoolingComponent::Backprop(const ChunkInfo &, // in_info,
4374  const ChunkInfo &, // out_info,
4375  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &in_value,
4376  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_value,
4377  const CuMatrixBase<BaseFloat> &out_deriv,
4378  Component *to_update,
4379  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> *in_deriv) const {
4380  int32 num_patches = input_dim_ / pool_stride_;
4381  int32 num_pools = num_patches / pool_size_;
4382  std::vector<int32> patch_summands(num_patches, 0);
4383  in_deriv->Resize(in_value.NumRows(), in_value.NumCols(), kSetZero);
4384 
4385  for(int32 q = 0; q < num_pools; q++) {
4386  for(int32 r = 0; r < pool_size_; r++) {
4387  int32 p = r + q * pool_size_;
4388  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> in_p(in_value.ColRange(p * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4389  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> out_q(out_value.ColRange(q * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4390  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> tgt(in_deriv->ColRange(p * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4391  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> src(out_deriv.ColRange(q * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4392  // zero-out mask
4393  CuMatrix<BaseFloat> mask;
4394  in_p.EqualElementMask(out_q, &mask);
4395  src.MulElements(mask);
4396  tgt.AddMat(1.0, src);
4397  // summed deriv info
4398  patch_summands[p] += 1;
4399  }
4400  }
4401 
4402  // scale in_deriv of overlaped pools
4403  for(int32 p = 0; p < num_patches; p++) {
4404  CuSubMatrix<BaseFloat> tgt(in_deriv->ColRange(p * pool_stride_, pool_stride_));
4405  KALDI_ASSERT(patch_summands[p] > 0);
4406  tgt.Scale(1.0 / patch_summands[p]);
4407  }
4408 }

4419  ExpectToken(is, binary, "</MaxpoolingComponent>");
4420 }
